Title: Pasta With Shrimp And Vegetables
Ingredients:
olive or salad oil
1 lb. large shrimp, shelled and deveined
2 green onions, thinly sliced
1 1/2 tsp. grated fresh ginger root
1 garlic clove, minced
salt
2 medium-size carrots, thinly sliced

1/2 c. chicken broth

1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
Directions:
About 40 minutes before serving:
In nonstick 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat, in 1 tablespoon hot olive or salad oil, cook shrimp, green onions, grated ginger, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon salt, stirring constantly until shrimp are opaque throughout, about 3 minutes.

1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
In 3-quart saucepan, combine milk and whipping cream.
Cook over low heat until warm (6 to 8 minutes).
In large mixer bowl, combine all remaining ingredients.
Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until smooth (2 to 3 minutes).
Gradually stir into milk mixture.
Cool to room temperature.
Pour into ice cream canister.
Freeze in ice cream maker according to manufacturer's directions.
Yield:
3 quarts.
explanation: The provided answer gives a recipe for making homemade ice cream with dairy products (milk, whipping cream, and eggs). question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:

Ingredients:

4 c. whole milk
2 c. sugar

Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
1 unbaked pie shell
1 c. grated Swiss cheese
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. chopped shallots
1/3 c. chopped celery
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
5 to 6 dashes red pepper sauce
1 c. whipping cream
3 large eggs, beaten
6 strips bacon, fried crisp
4 oz. sliced mushrooms (fresh)
1 (10 oz.) box chopped spinach (frozen), well drained
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
In large bowl, mix grated cheese and flour.
Add shallots, celery, garlic, parsley, red pepper sauce and dry seasonings.
Stir to mix.
Add cream and eggs.
Stir to mix.
Add crumbled bacon, mushrooms and spinach.
Pour into unbaked pie shell and bake 45 to 55 minutes.
Serves 8.
explanation: The given answer provides a recipe for Spinach Quiche using spinach, cheese, and eggs, which corresponds to the ingredients mentioned in the question. question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafel
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. dried chickpeas (garbanzo beans, about 12 oz.)
2 c. chopped fresh cilantro
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. allspice
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
5 garlic cloves, peeled
1 onion, quartered
1 leek, trimmed and cut into 3 pieces
6 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
Yogurt-Tahini Dip
8 (6-inch) pitas, cut in half
Directions:
Sort and wash chickpeas and place in large bowl. Cover with water to 2 inches above beans. Cover and let stand for 8 hours. Drain beans. Combine chickpeas, cilantro and next 8 ingredients in a food processor until mixture resembles coarse meal. Divide chickpea mixture into 16 equal portions, shaping each into 1/2 inch thick patties. Heat 2 Tbsp. oil in a large non-stick skillet. Add 5 patties and cook 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat procedure twice with remaining oil and patties. Spread 1 Tbsp. Yogurt-Tahini Dip in each pita half. Fill with 1 patty. Serves 8 (2 pita halves each).
explanation: The answer provided is a complete and accurate recipe for homemade falafel, including all necessary ingredients and step-by-step cooking instructions, which directly addresses the user's question for a falafel recipe.

These make a great sandwich served with sliced fresh tomato in pita pockets with a sauce made of plain yogurt and fresh dill.

Title: Falafil Or Taamiyah(Lebanese; International)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. fava beans, soaked in water for 18 hours, drained and finely ground with electric grinder
1 1/2 c. chickpeas, soaked in water for 19 hours, drained and finely ground with electric grinder
1 1/2 lb. finely chopped onions
4 c. finely chopped parsley
3 c. finely chopped fresh coriander
1 tsp. ground coriander

1/4 tsp. cayenne

1/2 tsp. flour

Directions:

Shape into small circles; pat with the palm of your hands, then fry in oil for 3 minutes on each side or until brown. Drain. Serve with pita bread, chopped parsley, pickles, tahini, chopped tomatoes.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Easy Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. butter
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 can mushrooms, sliced
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Cook the onion in butter in a saucepan over medium heat until transparent. Add the beef and cook, stirring until beef is light brown. Add the flour, salt, pepper, mushrooms and soup and cook for 5 minutes. Add the sour cream and simmer 15 more minutes. Serve over rice or noodles. Serves 6.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant to the user's question as it gives a detailed recipe for making beef stroganoff. It includes a list of ingredients, cooking instructions, and a serving suggestion, which directly addresses the user's need for information on how to prepare this dish.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?

1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 medium onion, sliced thin

Directions:

Brown meat, mushrooms and onions.

Cook and stir until thickened.

Serve over buttered noodles. Serves 4 to 6.

1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. mushrooms (2 small cans)

Add salt, mustard, butter, onion, pepper and one cup of water.
Pressure cook 10 to 12 minutes.
Make thickening of 2 tablespoons of flour and water.

Add mushrooms, simmer until thickened.
Add sour cream.
Serve over noodles or rice.

Directions:
Grate carrots and chop tomatoes; set aside.

Spoon into large ovenproof dish.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. oil
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. additional flour
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients in large bowl allowing yeast to soften.
Stir in oil and 2 cups flour.
Add more flour until dough holds together.
Grease your hands lightly and knead dough on floured board until smooth.
Cover and let rise 45 minutes.
Shape it to pans you are using or into individual disks all on greased pans.
Brush with sauce and cover with ingredients.
Let rise about 5 to 10 more minutes then bake in 425° oven for 15 minutes. This recipe also makes a nice French bread loaf.
My family makes individualized pizzas.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for homemade pizza dough, which directly addresses the question about how to make it. It lists the ingredients and gives step-by-step directions, including the rising time and baking instructions, which are essential aspects for making pizza dough.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. quick rise yeast (two 1/4 oz. packets)
1 tsp. salt
8 oz. lukewarm water (1 c.)
1/2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine flour, yeast, salt and sugar in mixing bowl and stir. Add vegetable oil and water.
Mix together all ingredients.
Knead by hand for 3 minutes; shape and put in bowl. Cover and let rise until double in volume (approximately 1/2 hour).
Punch down; divide into 2 equal pieces and shape into round balls or leave in one piece for 16-inch pizza.
Let dough rest for 4 minutes.
Roll out approximately 12 or 16-inches in diameter.
Spray pizza pan lightly with no stick vegetable cooking spray and wipe off excess. Place on pizza pan; let rise for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add sauce, toppings and cheese.
Place on bottom rack in cold oven; turn oven to 500° and bake 17 to 20 minutes, depending on oven.
explanation: The provided answer is completely relevant to the question. It lists the ingredients needed for homemade pizza dough and provides detailed step-by-step directions on how to make the dough, including the rising process and shaping. The instructions are clear and directly applicable to the user's inquiry about making pizza dough at home.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. sugar
5 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. warm water
Directions:
Put yeast, warm water and sugar in a small bowl.
In a large bowl, add the flour, salt/yeast mixture and warm water.
Mix together, then on a floured surface, knead for a few minutes.
Put dough into a well-greased bowl.
Cover with wax paper.
Let rise for 1 hour, then spread dough onto a well-greased pizza pan or cookie sheet.
Let rise another 1/2 hour.
Bake at 350° or until crust is brown on bottom.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question about making homemade pizza dough. It lists the ingredients and provides step-by-step instructions on how to prepare and bake the dough, which are essential aspects of the question asked.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water (105~ to 115~)
1 pkg. active dry yeast
2 Tbsp. shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salad oil
Directions:
Mix yeast in 1 cup of warm water, then add your flour, salt and shortening.
explanation: The answer provides the necessary ingredients and basic steps for making homemade pizza dough, which directly addresses the user's question about how to prepare pizza dough at home. question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
2 pkg. yeast
pinch of sugar
pinch of salt
1 c. warm water
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Mix first four ingredients.
Add water and oil.
Mix and knead until you are able to roll into a smooth ball.
Place in warm place with towel over it.
Let rise 30 minutes.
Punch down and let set for 4 minutes.
Roll out and place on pan and let rise for 15 minutes.
Add toppings (sauce, cheese, meats, veggies, etc.). Place pizza in cold oven, set temperature to 500° and bake for 15 to 17 minutes, or longer depending on your oven!
(This recipe works best on "Air-Pans.")
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question of making homemade pizza dough by listing the ingredients and step-by-step directions. question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Turkey Wild Rice Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground turkey
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. finely chopped carrots
6 c. low salt chicken broth
1/2 c. uncooked wild rice
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. flour
2 c. skim or regular milk
Directions:
Crumble ground turkey into 6-quart saucepan or Dutch oven. Stir in onion and carrots.
Cook over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Stir in chicken broth, rice, poultry seasoning, pepper and thyme.
Bring to boil and reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 45 to 55 minutes or until tender.
Place flour in a small bowl. Gradually add milk, blending until smooth.
Cook and stir over medium heat until soup bubbles and thickens slightly.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant to the user's question as it offers a detailed recipe for making Turkey Wild Rice Soup using ground turkey and rice as the main ingredients. It addresses the user's query by providing a practical and applicable solution that utilizes both the specified ingredients.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1/4 c. onion, chopped
2 c. diced potatoes
1 c. water
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
1 can cream-style corn
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan.
Add onion.
Saute until onion is golden yellow.
Add potatoes, water, salt and pepper.
Cover and cook on low heat until potatoes are very soft.
Stir frequently. Add corn, milk and evaporated milk.
Heat, stirring frequently, until chowder bubbles.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making corn chowder, which includes ingredients and step-by-step directions. It directly addresses the user's question about how to make a creamy corn chowder by offering a method and all necessary components.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Creamy Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
3 small potatoes, pared and diced into 1/2-inch cubes
2 c. boiling water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 c. milk
1/2 c. half and half
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. paprika
salt and pepper
1 3/4 c. fresh corn kernels (approximately 3 ears) or 1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen whole kernel corn
2 Tbsp. sliced fresh or canned pimiento
Directions:
Cook potatoes in boiling water and salt about 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
Meanwhile, saute the onion in butter until tender.
When potatoes are cooked, stir in onion, corn, pimiento, milk, half and half, brown sugar, paprika, salt and pepper to taste.
Simmer 20 to 30 minutes longer until soup is slightly thickened.
explanation: The provided answer gives a detailed recipe for making Creamy Corn Chowder, which directly addresses the user's query about how to create the dish. It lists all the necessary ingredients, provides the quantities, and outlines step-by-step instructions, including cooking times and methods, making it a fully relevant and useful response to the question.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?

5 medium potatoes, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1 (17 oz.) can cream-style corn
black pepper to taste

Directions:

Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Simmer about 10 minutes, stirring once or twice.
explanation: The answer provides a relevant recipe for creamy corn chowder, listing the ingredients and giving a brief overview of the cooking process, including the steps to make the chowder. It directly addresses the user's question about how to make the dish.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Creamy Sweet Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. unsalted butter or vegetable oil
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
2 1/2 c. uncooked corn kernels (about 5 ears cut from cob)
1 c. Russet potatoes, peeled and diced
2 c. reduced sodium or homemade chicken broth
1 bay leaf
1 1/2 c. low-fat milk
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat vegetable oil or butter until melted. Add onion and cook, stirring, over medium-low heat until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add 2 cup corn kernels, potatoes, chicken broth and bay leaf.
Cover and cook over low heat until tender, about 15 minutes.
Remove and discard bay leaf.
Cool slightly; transfer to a food processor with metal blade and puree in batches if necessary.
Press mixture through a sieve set over the saucepan. Pour milk through the sieve.
Add remaining 1/2 cup corn to the saucepan.
Heat over low heat, stirring until warm; do not boil.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant because it gives a specific recipe for Creamy Sweet Corn Chowder, which closely resembles the user's query for how to make a creamy corn chowder. The answer includes a list of ingredients and detailed cooking directions, which are essential components for someone seeking to learn how to prepare this dish. question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
6 Tbsp. chopped onion
3/4 c. chopped celery
2 1/2 c. hot water
2 medium boiling potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2 inch cubes
3 c. fresh or frozen corn kernels, thawed
2 Tbsp. sugar (or less, according to taste)
2 Tbsp. flour
1 qt. half and half
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan.
Add onion and celery; saute 5 minutes until soft, but not brown.
Add water, potatoes, corn, sugar, salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer until potatoes are barely tender, about 30 minutes.
Whisk flour into 1 cup half and half; stir into soup.
Add remaining half and half and simmer until soup has thickened to a creamy consistency, about 15 minutes.
Season to taste with additional salt and pepper if needed.
If too thick, add more milk; if too thin, simmer 5 to 10 minutes longer.
Makes 9 servings, about 1 cup each.
explanation: The provided answer is a detailed recipe for making corn chowder, which directly corresponds to the user's query about how to make a creamy corn chowder. It includes a list of ingredients, specific quantities, and step-by-step cooking instructions to achieve the desired creamy consistency, making it a highly relevant response.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (about 12 medium), peeled and cooked
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 c. onions, finely chopped
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Mash hot peppers.
Add cream cheese and butter in pieces.
Beat until both melted.
Mix in sour cream.
To milk, add eggs and onions; whip lightly.
Add to potato mixture along with seasonings. Beat until light and fluffy.
Place in greased 9-inch round casserole dish.
Refrigerate several hours (can be chilled overnight if not needed immediately).
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Serves 8 to 12.
explanation: The answer provided is titled 'Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes' which suggests a specific context for the recipe, but it does not explicitly state that the recipe is simple. The ingredients and steps provided do align with making mashed potatoes, but the lack of emphasis on simplicity and direct relevance to a basic mashed potato recipe makes it only partially relevant. A simple mashed potato recipe would typically not include cream cheese or specific seasoning instructions for a 'special occasion'.

answer:
Title: Simple Potato Salad
Ingredients:
6 to 8 potatoes, diced
4 eggs, boiled
1 medium onion, chopped
3 fresh kosher pickles, chopped
salt to taste
pepper to taste
1/2 c. Miracle Whip fat-free
1 Tbsp. mustard
Directions:

Drain and mash.
Add onion, pickle, mustard and Miracle Whip.
Chop 2 eggs.
Add to mix.
Mix well. Garnish with 2 eggs.
explanation: The provided answer discusses a recipe for Simple Potato Salad, not mashed potatoes as requested. question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a clear, step-by-step recipe for making mashed potatoes, directly addressing the user's request for a simple recipe. The ingredients and directions are relevant and applicable, detailing how to prepare and serve the dish, which fulfills the question's requirement.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Christmas Eve Simple Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground chuck
1 medium onion
1 large (16 to 20 oz.) pkg. frozen corn
4 to 6 c. mashed potatoes (fresh or instant)
Directions:
In a large skillet, brown diced onion in small amount of fat. Add ground chuck.
Cook until done and crumbly.
Prepare mashed potatoes.
Cook frozen corn.
Slightly grease or spray nonstick cooking spray a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Drain fat from meat. Spread crumbled meat in bottom of dish.
Spread cooked corn on top of meat.
Carefully spread mashed potatoes on top.
Dot with butter or margarine.
Sprinkle with paprika.
Bake at 325° to 350° until brown, about 1/2 hour.
explanation: The provided recipe is for a Shepherd's Pie, which includes ground chuck, onions, and frozen corn, and does not contain any instructions or ingredients for making mashed potatoes. The user asked for a simple recipe for mashed potatoes, which is not addressed in the given answer.

Ingredients:

6 large eggs, lightly beaten

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken Florentine
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, defrosted and squeezed dry
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 c. milk
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
1/2 c. light cream
4 large boned, skinned chicken breasts, cooked and cut into bite size pieces
3/4 c. Italian bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
Grease (or Pam) 9 x 9-inch casserole.
Spread spinach on bottom, then chicken.
In saucepan, melt 3 tablespoons butter. Stir in flour to form roux.
Slowly stir in milk, then add seasonings.
Cook until thick and just beginning to boil.
Add Parmesan and cream, stirring, over low heat until cheese melts. Pour sauce over chicken.
Combine crumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle on sauce.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until heated through.
Serve with rice.
Serves 6.
Can be doubled in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
explanation: The answer provided is a recipe for Chicken Florentine that uses both ground chicken and spinach as key ingredients. question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?

1/4 tsp. pepper

Rub butter on skin.
Season with paprika, salt and pepper.
Scatter onions over all sides.
Put turkey in roasting pan.

Roast about 1 1/2 hours until 160° to 165° on meat thermometer or until liquid runs clear.
Baste during roasting.

salt and pepper

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Ground Lamb Curry
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground lamb
2 Tbsp. flour
1 large onion, sliced thinly
1/2 to 2 tsp. curry powder (depends on taste)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. water or stock
1/2 c. raisins
juice and grated peel of 1 lemon
2 whole cloves
Directions:
Brown meat in large skillet; pour off all but 2 tablespoons of drippings. Push meat to one side. Add flour and brown slightly, stirring constantly. Add all remaining ingredients and mix in the meat. Cover and simmer about 15 minutes or until onions are tender. Remove cloves before serving. Serve over hot rice. Serves 4.
explanation: The provided answer gives a specific recipe (Ground Lamb Curry) that directly addresses the user's question about cooking with ground lamb. It includes a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions, making it a relevant and useful response to the query.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Lamb Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
5 eggs, well beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 c. sugar
2 c. flour
1/4 tsp. mace
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cream the butter. Add sugar. Add eggs.
Beat on high speed 3 minutes. Sift, measure and sift flour, salt, mace and baking powder together. Sift again. Add dry ingredients to creamed mixture in 3 installments.
Beat 1 minute after each addition. Add lemon juice. Beat 1/2 minute.
Pour into bottom and face of lamb. Place on cookie sheet in oven at 325° for 1 hour.
Remove from oven.
Lift lid off.
Usually done at this point.
explanation: The provided answer describes a recipe for a 'Lamb Cake', which does not align with the user's query about cooking options with ground lamb. question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Roasted Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
2 red onions
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
2 Tbsp. garlic olive oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. parmesan cheese
Directions:
Make cauliflower into 1-1/2 inch florets.
Cut red onions into 8 wedges.
Heat oven to 475°.
In non-stick roasting pan, mix cauliflower, onions, oil, salt and 1/4 tsp. pepper.
Roast 15 minutes. Toss and roast 5 to 10 minutes until lightly charcoal and tender. Transfer to platter, top with 1/4 tsp. pepper, parsley and cheese.
explanation: The answer provides a comprehensive recipe for roasted cauliflower, which directly addresses the user's question. It includes a list of ingredients, step-by-step directions, and incorporates all the key elements required for making the dish. Title: Quick Beef And Cauliflower
Ingredients:

Directions:
Brown steak cubes in oil in skillet.
Add cauliflower, green pepper, garlic and soy sauce; mix well.
Simmer, covered, for 8 to 10 minutes.
Blend cornstarch, sugar and broth in bowl.
Stir into beef mixture with green onions and mushrooms.
Cook until thickened, stirring constantly.
Serve over rice.
Yield:
6 servings.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Braised Vegetables With Couscous
Ingredients:
4 tsp. vegetable oil
2 c. sliced onions
1 c. sliced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1 c. sliced zucchini
1 lb. rinsed, drained, canned chickpeas

1 c. sliced scallions (with tops)

1 (2 1/4 oz.) can drained ripe olives

Directions:

Serves 6. Enjoy.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Veggie-Topped Couscous
Ingredients:
1 large onion, cut into thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. olive oil or cooking oil
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (optional)
2 medium zucchini, quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (2 1/2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium stewed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 c. reduced sodium chicken broth
1 c. couscous
1/4 c. chopped unsalted dry roasted peanuts
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and garlic in hot oil over medium-low heat until crisp-tender.
Stir in carrots, 1/2 cup water, basil, cumin, salt and, if desired, red pepper.
Bring to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in zucchini, garbanzo beans and tomatoes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir together 2 tablespoons water and cornstarch.
Stir into tomato mixture.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for Veggie-Topped Couscous, which includes couscous as a key ingredient. However, it does not specifically mention the use of chickpeas, even though garbanzo beans (a type of chickpea) are included in the recipe. The presence of chickpeas in the recipe is relevant to the question, but the answer could be more directly tailored by explicitly stating that it's a chickpea and couscous dish. Despite this, it still offers relevant information about making a dish with both chickpeas and couscous.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Couscous Pilaf
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. sliced zucchini
1 small onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. white wine or chicken broth
1 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. couscous
1 c. cherry tomatoes
1/4 c. pitted black olives, cut in half (Kalamata best)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
Directions:
Melt butter; add onion, zucchini, salt, pepper, garlic and basil.
Cook until zucchini is tender, 4 to 5 minutes.
Add wine; bring to boil.
Cook 1 minute.
Add broth; bring to boil.
Stir in couscous, olives and tomatoes.
Remove from heat; cover.
Let stand until liquid is absorbed (about 5 minutes).
Before serving, fluff with fork; sprinkle with parsley.
explanation: The provided answer is titled 'Vegetable Couscous Pilaf' and includes couscous as an ingredient, which aligns with the user's question about using couscous. However, it doesn't mention chickpeas, which were part of the original question. The recipe could be modified to include chickpeas for a closer match to the user's query, but as it stands, it only partially addresses the question. Therefore, the answer is partly relevant but incomplete without the inclusion of chickpeas.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes, pared
2 tsp. salt
2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese with chives, cubed
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. heavy cream
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Cook potatoes with 1 teaspoon salt in boiling water until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes until smooth; add cream cheese, 4 tablespoons butter, garlic salt, pepper and 1 teaspoon salt.
Mix until smooth.
Gradually add cream; mix well after each addition. Put in greased baking dish.
(Bake at once or cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.)
Dot top of potatoes with 2 tablespoons butter and sprinkle with paprika.
Bake in 325° oven 30 minutes. Increase heat to 375° and bake 30 minutes more.
explanation: The provided answer gives a comprehensive recipe for creamy mashed potatoes, listing all the necessary ingredients and step-by-step directions. The answer directly addresses the user's question about creating a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes, making it relevant and useful.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 cloves crushed garlic
4 medium-sized all-purpose potatoes, peeled and thin sliced
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. plain low-fat yogurt
Directions:
In a medium-size heavy saucepan, bring 3 cups water to a boil. Add garlic, potatoes and bay leaf.
Cook, partially covered, over moderate heat until potatoes are "fork tender" (reserving 3 tablespoons cooking water).
Discard bay leaf, transfer potatoes to a large mixing bowl.
Add margarine, buttermilk and yogurt.
Beat with a mixer, then add just enough of the reserved water to make the potatoes creamy.
explanation: The provided answer includes a recipe for mashed potatoes, which is relevant to the question about creamy mashed potatoes. However, it does not specify that the potatoes are creamy, which could imply that the recipe may not result in the desired creamy texture. The inclusion of ingredients like garlic and bay leaf, and the method of cooking, contribute to the relevance but miss the emphasis on the creaminess aspect. Therefore, the answer is partly relevant but could be improved by explicitly mentioning the creamy nature of the mashed potatoes.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.
explanation: The provided answer offers a complete recipe for creamy mashed potatoes, including ingredients, quantities, and step-by-step directions. It directly addresses the user's request for a recipe and provides the necessary information to prepare the dish, making it highly relevant.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (about 12 medium), peeled and cooked
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 c. onions, finely chopped
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Mash hot peppers.
Add cream cheese and butter in pieces.
Beat until both melted.
Mix in sour cream.
To milk, add eggs and onions; whip lightly.
Add to potato mixture along with seasonings. Beat until light and fluffy.
Place in greased 9-inch round casserole dish.
Refrigerate several hours (can be chilled overnight if not needed immediately).
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Serves 8 to 12.
explanation: The provided answer offers a recipe for 'Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes' which includes ingredients and steps that are relevant to making creamy mashed potatoes. However, it does not mention the cooking method or any specific technique (such as using a ricer or masher) that may be important for achieving the creamy texture. Additionally, the title 'Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes' suggests it might be more of a celebratory dish rather than a plain creamy mashed potatoes recipe, which could be considered a minor detail but still affects the overall relevance.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: "Make Ahead" Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
9 large baking potatoes, peeled and cut in chunks
1/2 c. butter/oleo, softened
12 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/2 c. sour cream
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
pinch of ground nutmeg
Directions:
Place potatoes in a large pot. Cover with water and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer over medium heat until potatoes are tender. Drain.
Put potatoes in mixing bowl.
Beat with mixer until light and fluffy. Beat in butter and cream cheese (which have been cut in small chunks).
Beat in sour cream, nutmeg, salt and pepper.
Transfer mixture to a heavily buttered casserole dish. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate.
Before serving, bring to room temperature, then bake, uncovered, in preheated 350° oven for 20 to 30 minutes.
Makes 8 servings.
May be fixed 2 to 3 days ahead.
explanation: The provided answer gives a detailed recipe for creamy mashed potatoes, including all necessary ingredients and step-by-step directions. It addresses the user's request for a creamy mashed potato recipe by describing the ingredients and the process in a way that is directly applicable to making the dish.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
fish of your choice
salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Put aluminum foil on grill.
Punch holes in foil.
Spray foil with Pam cooking spray.
Place fish, skin side down.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Squeeze lemon juice on fillet.
Cook on grill at medium temperature for 15 to 20 minutes or until flaky.
Top with Molly McButter flakes.
explanation: The answer provides a relevant recipe for grilled fish and mentions the use of lemon juice, which aligns with the user's request. question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Baked Fish On Grill
Ingredients:
2 medium to large fish fillets
1 small onion
1 lemon
garlic salt
black pepper
butter
Directions:
Place 2 to 3 pats of butter under each fillet on aluminum foil.
Place 2 to 3 pats on top of each fillet.
Slice onion and pop out rings.
Lay on top.
Slice lemon in thin slices.
Place on top of onion.
Sprinkle with garlic salt and pepper to taste. Roll foil around and seal.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes (depending on size of fillets), turning once.
This may also be baked in a preheated oven.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for cooking fish, which is relevant to the user's request for a grilled fish recipe with lemon. However, it suggests baking the fish on foil rather than grilling it directly on a grill, which does not fully align with the user's original request for a grilled method. The inclusion of lemon and seasoning details is appropriate, but the cooking method is not.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
2 lb. fish
1/2 c. salad oil
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. capers and juice (optional)
2 Tbsp. catsup
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
4 bay leaves, crushed
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
paprika
Directions:
Marinate fish for 30 minutes in mixed ingredients.
Cook on grill about 8 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily with fork.
Baste fish while grilling and sprinkle with paprika.
Baste shrimp or scallops only, don't marinate.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for grilled fish, which is relevant to the user's request for a fish recipe. question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
4 fish fillets
1/2 c. margarine
1/2 Tbsp. garlic salt
1/4 Tbsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
light vegetable oil cooking spray
1/4 c. cornmeal
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
4 tsp. blackening seasoning
4 (4 oz.) catfish fillets
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 400°.
Spray the vegetable oil over the baking sheet 3 times to coat.
Put the cornmeal, thyme and basil on a large plate and mix well.
Sprinkle 1/8 teaspoon of the garlic powder, 1/8 teaspoon of the lemon pepper and 1 teaspoon of the blackening seasoning on each of the catfish fillets.
Coat the fillets thoroughly with the cornmeal mixture and transfer them to the prepared baking sheet.
Dust each fillet with 1/8 teaspoon of the paprika.
Coat the catfish lightly with the cooking spray. Place the baking sheet on the bottom shelf of the oven.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Reduce the heat to 350° and bake for about 5 minutes more, until the crust is golden and the fish flakes easily.
explanation: The provided answer gives a recipe for grilled catfish but does not specifically mention lemon in the preparation or as an ingredient. However, it does include lemon pepper and lemon juice in the seasoning, which implies the use of lemon. The core of the question asked for a recipe with lemon, and while the lemon elements are present, the absence of direct reference to lemon in the recipe title or as a key ingredient makes it only partly relevant to the user's request.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh fish (any kind)
splash of white wine
3 slices lemon
3 sprigs fresh dill
Directions:
Place fish on tin foil.
Splash with wine.
Place lemon slices and dill on top of fish.
Wrap fish in foil tightly.
Grill on medium coals for 20 minutes or until fish flakes.
This is very low cal and a great way to do any kind of fish.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 avocados, peeled and chopped
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped red onions
1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and hot pepper sauce until well blended. Toss lightly with remaining ingredients until evenly coated with dressing. Cover - chill to blend flavors.
explanation: The provided recipe, titled 'Avocado Egg Salad', does not match the user's question for a quick recipe for avocado toast with eggs. The recipe is for a salad, not a toast, and does not include the method of preparation or the use of toast.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Quick Avocado Soup(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1 can chilled chicken broth
1 avocado, peeled, pitted and diced
1/2 c. half and half
1/2 tsp. lemon juice to taste
1 Tbsp. dry sherry (optional)
1/4 tsp. each salt, pepper and dill weed
Directions:
In a blender or food processor, combine all ingredients. Blend to combine. Process until smooth.
Chill 1 hour or longer covered.
Serve sprinkled with chives.
explanation: The provided answer is about a 'Quick Avocado Soup', which is unrelated to the user's question about a recipe for avocado toast with eggs. The ingredients and directions given pertain to making a soup, not a toast with eggs.

8 eggs
1 tsp. pepper
salt to taste
1/2 c. light cream
1 avocado, peeled and cubed (about 1 c.)
2 Tbsp. margarine
12 slices bacon, fried and crumbled
Directions:
Mix eggs,
pepper,
salt
and cream with fork.	Stir in avocado.
Heat
margarine
in
12-inch
Dutch oven over medium heat until just
hot
enough
to sizzle a drop of water.
Pour egg mixture into oven.	As egg mixture begins to set at bottom and side,
lift
cooked
portion
with spatula so the thin uncooked portion
can
flow to the bottom.
Avoid constant stirring.
Cook until eggs are thickened through but still moist. Sprinkle bacon on eggs.

Garnish with leaf of lettuce.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Salza
Ingredients:
2 ripe California avocados, peeled and diced
1/2 c. canned corn (uncooked)
1 (2.2 oz.) can sliced black olives, drained
1/4 c. diced red pepper
2 Tbsp. toasted, slivered almonds, chopped
2 Tbsp. diced white onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper

Directions:
In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients, except avocado. Store in sealed container at room temperature for 6 to 8 hours. Before serving, add diced avocados.
Serve with chicken or your favorite grilled meat.
Makes 3 cups.

mayonnaise to taste

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken Salad(Number Of Servings: 2)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. finely chopped celery
2 Tbsp. sweet relish
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
black pepper to taste
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. finely minced onion

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?

Ingredients:
4 to 6 chicken breasts, cooked and chopped
3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
2 stalks celery, finely chopped
1/4 c. sweet pickle relish

salt and pepper to taste

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?

pinch of salt

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. cumin
Directions:
Brown the ground beef and onions. Drain. Add other ingredients and simmer over low heat until most of the liquid is absorbed. Easily increased for more than 1 pound.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question about making a traditional beef taco filling. question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Meat Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. (8 oz.) tomato sauce
1 tsp. chili powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Brown beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly; drain excess fat.
Stir in remaining ingredients; simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.
Makes filling for 8 taco shells.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. water
1 pkg. taco seasoning mix or use Taco Seasoning Mix recipe
1 can pinto, red, or chili beans, drained
1 can whole kernel corn, drained
Directions:
Brown ground beef in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Drain excess grease.
Add water and taco seasoning mix and beans. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes, add corn stirring occasionally.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question about making a traditional beef taco filling. question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. pork, cut into small pieces
1 onion, diced
salt and pepper to taste
1 can tomato sauce
1/2 hot banana pepper
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Brown pork with onion.
Add garlic, salt and pepper.
When browned well, mix in flour.
Add a little warm water, the can of tomato sauce and banana pepper.
Simmer until tender, about 1 hour.
Serve on warmed taco or burrito shell.
Garnish with chopped tomatoes, lettuce, additional hot sauce (if needed) and shredded cheese.
explanation: The answer provided is relevant in terms of the process to make a taco filling, but it specifically mentions pork as the main ingredient instead of beef. question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Picadillo (Filling For Tacos)
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. diced onion
2 or 3 cloves garlic, minced (if desired)
1 large tomato
1 or 2 potatoes, diced
1 or 2 carrots, diced
1/2 c. peas
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. fresh cilantro, chopped (available in Cub Foods produce)
1 or 2 jalapeno peppers, diced
Directions:
Cook ground beef until browned.
Drain off excess fat.
Add onion, garlic and peppers.
Cook until tender.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes.
Serve as a filling in corn or flour tortillas that have been warmed on a grill or in the microwave.
Serve with hot sauce.
Especially good with frijoles (beans).
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for a traditional beef taco filling called Picadillo, which includes all the necessary ingredients (ground beef, onion, garlic, tomato, potatoes, carrots, peas, salt, cilantro, and jalapeno peppers) and a step-by-step cooking process. It also suggests serving the filling in tortillas and with hot sauce, which is typical for a beef taco. The inclusion of frijoles (beans) matches the common pairing with tacos, further emphasizing the relevance of the answer to the question.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Crispy Pork Chops
Ingredients:
4 pork chops (1 inch thick)
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. Dijon-style mustard
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. dried thyme leaves
Directions:
Cut off excess fat from edges of chops.
Bread chops in the egg and crumbs, coating well.
Broil on a lightly greased rack about 8 inches away from heat for 10 minutes.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question of how to make crispy baked pork chops. It lists the necessary ingredients and provides step-by-step directions, including cutting excess fat, breading the chops in egg and crumbs, and broiling them for a specified time. The process described is coherent with the goal of achieving crispy pork chops, making the answer fully relevant.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter
1 c. coarse cracker crumbs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 egg, beaten
2 Tbsp. milk or more
6 pork chops
Directions:
Combine crumbs, salt and pepper. In another bowl, blend egg and milk.
Coat chops with crumbs.
Dip in egg mixture and again in crumbs.
Place butter in pan.
Melt.
Place chops in a 13 x 9-inch pan and bake at 325° for 30 minutes.
Turn chops and bake 30 minutes more.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making oven-baked pork chops, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make crispy baked pork chops. It includes ingredients, quantities, and step-by-step directions for preparation and cooking, ensuring the user can achieve the desired result.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Delicious Crispies
Ingredients:
1 yeast cake
1/2 c. water
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. shortening
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk, scalded
5 to 6 c. flour
1 tsp. lemon flavoring
1/2 c. soft butter
1 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Soften yeast in warm water.
Add 1/2 cup sugar, shortening and salt to scalded milk.
Cool.
Add 2 cups flour and beat well.
Add eggs, yeast and lemon flavoring.
Beat well and add remaining flour.
Knead until smooth.
Place in greased bowl.
Cover and let rise until doubled (1 1/2 hours).
explanation: The provided answer includes a detailed recipe for making a sweet bread dough, not crispy baked pork chops. The ingredients and directions pertain to baking, not cooking pork chops, thus it does not address the user's question about making crispy baked pork chops.

Ingredients:
6 large pork chops
garlic seasoning
black pepper
salt
1 onion, sliced
3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
4 sliced baking potatoes (leave skin on)
4 carrots
Directions:
Take Brown-in-Bag and shake flour in bag.
Place all meat, potatoes and carrots in bag.
Then take all seasonings and place on meat, potatoes and carrots.
Close bag; tie.
Slit 3 or 4 holes on top of bag.
Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, sliced
1 clove garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3 c. water or chicken stock
8 oz. dried lentils
1 tsp. salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil over medium heat until onions are tender. Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice. Simmer about 5 more minutes. Serves 4.
explanation: The answer provides a relevant and useful recipe that uses both lentils and spinach as specified in the question. It gives a clear title, list of ingredients, and step-by-step cooking directions, making it a relevant response for someone looking to cook with these ingredients.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 c. water
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can cut tomatoes
4 tsp. vegetable bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt and thyme
1/4 tsp. fennel seed and pepper
1 bay leaf
2 medium chopped carrots (1 c.)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Rinse lentils; set aside.
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven cook onion and garlic until tender, not brown.
Stir in lentils, water, tomatoes, bouillon, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme, fennel seed, pepper and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and frozen spinach. Bring to a boil, breaking up spinach with a fork; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add vinegar; discard bay leaf.
Makes 4 servings.
explanation: The answer provided is a complete recipe for a Lentil-Spinach Stew, which directly addresses the user's question about a dish that can be made with lentils and spinach. It includes all necessary ingredients (lentils and spinach) and provides clear instructions on how to prepare them into a meal, making it highly relevant to the question asked.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced onions
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 lb. dry lentils
1 lb. frozen, chopped spinach
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
3 c. water
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil in 3-quart saucepan over medium heat until onions are tender.
Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice.
Cover and simmer until spinach is tender, about 5 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that directly uses both lentils and spinach, which are the key ingredients inquired about in the question. It includes the full list of ingredients and detailed cooking directions, making it a relevant response to the user's request for a recipe.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Spinach
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils (1 c.)
1 lb. spinach, chopped
1 onion
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. coriander
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. chili powder
lemon juice to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the lentils in 1 pint (2 cups) water until soft (about 25 minutes).
Fry sliced onion and chopped garlic; add spices.
Stir about 2 minutes.
Add cooked lentils and washed and coarsely chopped spinach.
Stir well.
Simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Add salt and lemon juice.
explanation: The answer directly provides a recipe for a dish that uses both lentils and spinach as key ingredients, addressing the user's question effectively. It includes the necessary ingredients, quantities, and step-by-step directions for preparation, which are all pertinent to the query about what one can make with these two ingredients.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. pkg. lentils
1 pkg. frozen spinach
1 small chopped onion
1 stalk celery, chopped
1 carrot, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
8 c. water
1 bouillon cube
2 Tbsp. vinegar
freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large soup pot or crock-pot. Cook on low for 6 hours.
If using a crock-pot, set crock-pot to high and cook 6 hours.
Add ground pepper to taste.
Can also add two chopped Italian sausages to ingredients for different flavor before cooking.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe titled 'Lentil Spinach Soup' that directly addresses the user's question about making something with lentils and spinach. It includes the ingredients and steps to prepare the dish, which are pertinent to the query.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Good Carrots
Ingredients:
12 carrots, peeled and sliced
1/4 c. butter
1 small onion, minced
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
2 c. milk
1/4 tsp. celery salt
3 c. buttered bread crumbs or Pepperidge Farm stuffing
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese slices
Directions:
Cook carrots.
Saute onion in butter.
Stir in flour, salt, dry mustard and milk.
Add pepper and celery salt.
In 2-quart casserole, arrange layers of carrots and cheese, ending with carrots.
Pour on sauce.
Top with crumbs.
Bake 20 minutes or until hot throughout.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that includes both carrots and cabbage, but it does not mention cabbage in the title, ingredients, or directions. corned beef
cabbage
potato
carrot

1 sliced large onion

Ingredients:

8 carrots
8 red peppers
8 green peppers
12 medium onions
3 pt. white vinegar
6 c. sugar

Directions:

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Great Grandma'S Recipe For Soft Molasses Cookies
Ingredients:
4 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 1/4 c. hot water
1 tsp. lemon extract
2 eggs
3/4 c. shortening
2 c. brown sugar, packed
3/4 c. molasses
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
In separate bowl, combine shortening, sugar, extract, molasses and eggs.
Add dry ingredients.
Add hot water last.
Drop by teaspoons on greased cookie sheet.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 8 to 10 minutes.
explanation: The given answer provides a recipe for soft molasses cookies, which can be interpreted as a type of soft sugar cookie due to the inclusion of brown sugar and molasses. However, the title and ingredients do not explicitly mention 'soft sugar cookies,' which could lead to some confusion. question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. buttered Crisco
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix
shortening and sugar;
beat well.	Add vanilla and lemon juice.
Add
egg
and beat until light. Add flour, soda and
salt; alternate	with buttermilk.
Drop by tablespoonful and sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon.
Top with raisins.
Bake at 350° for 10 minutes or until lightly brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. sugar
3/4 tsp. salt
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. hot water
4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 c. butter, softened
4 egg yolks
1 tsp. baking soda
1 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Cream sugar, butter, salt, yolks and whole eggs.
Dissolve soda in hot water.
Add with sour cream to butter mixture.
Sift flour, baking powder, nutmeg and vanilla and add to egg mixture. Dough will be sticky.
Cover and chill several hours or overnight. Roll on well-floured surface.
Cut and bake on cookie sheet at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes or until cookies are set, but not browned.
explanation: The provided answer is a comprehensive recipe for soft sugar cookies that matches the user's query. It includes all the necessary ingredients and step-by-step directions for preparing the dough, rolling, cutting, and baking the cookies to achieve the desired softness. The answer directly addresses the user's request for a recipe for soft sugar cookies.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Big Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable shortening or oleo
3 eggs
1 c. buttermilk
4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Cream sugar and shortening.
Add rest of ingredients as any other recipe.
Drop a teaspoon of dough on cookie sheet.
Flatten with a small jar or object dipped in milk and then in a mixture of 2 tablespoons sugar and 1 tablespoon flour.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350°.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant because it gives a specific recipe for soft sugar cookies, listing the ingredients and providing the directions for making them. It directly addresses the question about a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
3 1/4 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 c. sugar
1 egg (unbeaten)
1 1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. thick sour cream
Directions:
Mix together flour, soda and salt. Combine butter, egg, sugar and flavoring. Add sour cream and half of flour. Blend. Add remaining flour. Roll to 1/4-inch thickness on lightly floured surface. Cut. Place on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes.
explanation: The provided answer is a full recipe for soft sugar cookies, which directly addresses the user's question about finding a good recipe for this type of cookie. It includes specific ingredients, quantities, and baking instructions, all of which are relevant to the user's query.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 large bell peppers (any color)
1 tsp. olive oil
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 medium squash, diced (yellow)
1 medium zucchini, diced
1/2 c. onion, diced
2 medium cloves garlic, minced
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese, grated
1 c. tomato juice (no salt added)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°. Cut peppers in half lengthwise. Remove stems, rubs and seeds. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat, swirling to cover bottom. Saut crookneck squash, zucchini, onion and garlic until zucchini is tender-crisp (about 4 minutes). Don't overcook. In a medium bowl, combine rice and cheese. Gently stir into skillet. Stuff pepper halves with vegetable mixture. Place in a 9-inch casserole dish. Carefully pour tomato sauce around peppers. Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes. Serves 8.
explanation: The provided answer is a complete recipe for baked stuffed bell peppers, including all necessary ingredients and step-by-step cooking directions. It directly addresses the user's question and offers a clear, relevant guideline for preparing the dish.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
2 lb. hamburger meat
2 to 3 green onions
1/2 regular onion
2 chopped tomatoes
parsley, salt and pepper to taste
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 tsp. garlic
2 to 3 c. cooked, seasoned rice
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. tomato sauce
1/2 c. white cooking wine
1/2 c. water or chicken stock
Directions:
Bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant to the user's question about making baked stuffed bell peppers. It lists all the necessary ingredients and gives a clear set of directions for preparing the dish, including baking time and temperature. The answer directly addresses the user's need for a recipe.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
18 small bell peppers
3/4 c. cooked rice
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped bell peppers
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/4 tsp. ground red peppers
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut thin slice from top of each green pepper; remove stems and seeds.
In saucepan over medium heat, in 1-inch boiling water, heat peppers to boiling.
Reduce heat to low.
Cover; simmer 5 minutes or until peppers are tender to crisp.
Drain.
In shallow baking dish, arrange peppers.
Meanwhile, in a skillet, brown meat and cook with chopped peppers and onions until tender.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
Spoon mixture into green peppers.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
After the first 10 minutes of baking, baste with tomato basting sauce.
Baste after every 10 minutes of baking.
Serves 18.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making stuffed bell peppers, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions, which directly addresses the user's question about how to prepare baked stuffed bell peppers.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger meat
1 small onion, chopped
6 green peppers
1/2 c. uncooked rice
tomatoes
tomato sauce
1/4 c. water
salt, pepper, oregano, basil, parsley and onion salt
cheese
Directions:
Place a little oil in skillet. Brown meat with onion; drain. Add salt, pepper and other seasonings
(use the seasonings you like). Add rice, tomatoes, sauce and water; cook on low heat for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally. Wash and cut off tops of peppers. Take out seeds. Put in pan and cover with water and bring to a boil. When a knife goes through peppers and they are tender, remove from water and set aside. Put mixture in peppers. (Peppers can be left whole and cut in half.) Sprinkle cheese on top to melt (whatever kind you like).
These can be put in freezer for later when you need something fast. Serve with mashed potatoes and vegetable.
explanation: The answer provides a step-by-step recipe for making baked stuffed bell peppers, which directly addresses the user's question about preparing this dish. It lists all necessary ingredients and gives specific instructions for cooking them, including preparing the peppers, stuffing them with the meat and rice mixture, and serving suggestions. The answer is comprehensive and relevant to the question.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
6 large bell peppers
2 c. cooked rice
1 lb. ground meat
1 can tomatoes and green chilies
1/2 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 can cream of mushroom soup
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut tops off and center out of peppers.
Put peppers in boiling water; cook until tender.
Saute meat and pepper tops with salt.
Drain off excess oil.
Mix well the meat, rice, 1/2 of liquid from tomatoes and soups.
If you want it hotter, add rest of tomato juice.
Place peppers in pan and stuff with mixture. Bake at 350° for 20 minutes, or until bubbling hot.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making stuffed bell peppers, directly addressing the user's question by listing the ingredients and step-by-step instructions. question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut-Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. linguine or thin spaghetti
3 garlic cloves
1 1/2 tsp. minced peeled ginger root
7 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
6 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/4 c. rice wine vinegar
1/4 c. honey
1 tsp. dark sesame oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 c. broccoli florets, blanched until tender-crisp
1 c. sliced Napa cabbage
1/2 c. carrots, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions until al dente; rinse in cold water and drain well.
In food processor or blender, combine garlic, ginger, soy sauce, peanut butter, vinegar, honey, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce; process until blended.
Add water to reach desired consistency (1/2 to 3/4 cup), processing until smooth.
To serve, toss cooked linguine with vegetables and sauce. Yield:
6 servings.
explanation: The answer provided is directly relevant to the question. It details a recipe for peanut-sesame noodles, which includes a peanut butter sauce. The ingredients listed and the cooking directions include peanut butter, which is essential for making the peanut butter sauce mentioned in the question. Therefore, it fully addresses the user's query for how to make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Simple Peanut Butter Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. peanut butter
1 c. sugar
3 egg whites
Directions:
Separate egg whites; beat with mixer on medium for 2 minutes. Slowly add sugar.
Beat on high until soft peaks form.
Mix peanut butter into mixture by hand.
Drop spoonful of mix onto ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake 7 to 10 minutes or until golden brown. Cookies will be soft.
Let cool, then enjoy.

1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Spanish-Style Chicken And Sausage
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 lb. sweet or spicy Italian sausage or chorizo, cut into 1/2-inch slices

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Homemade Summer Sausage
Ingredients:
3 lb. hamburger
1 lb. sausage or chicken, ground
2 tsp. liquid smoke
4 Tbsp. Morton curing salt (Tender Quick)
1 tsp. garlic salt
2 Tbsp. mustard seed
1 1/2 c. cold water
Directions:
Mix all together.
Cover and store in refrigerator for 24 hours. Make into four loaves. Wrap in aluminum foil, leaving ends open. Poke holes in bottom of foil. Place loaves on cookie sheet. Bake 1 hour and 45 minutes at 350°. Slice thin.
Serve with crackers. Keep in refrigerator.
Keeps 4 to 6 weeks.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Sausage
Ingredients:
1 lb. sweet Italian sausage
3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 (3 lb.) chicken, cut up
1/4 c. oil
1 medium onion, sliced
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 (16 oz.) can whole or crushed tomatoes with their juices
1/4 tsp. caraway seed
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas
Directions:
Pierce sausage with a fork several times.
Place sausage in a small frying pan; cook over low heat for about 20 minutes to render fat.
Drain on paper towels.
Slice into 1-inch chunks. Place flour, pepper and paprika in a plastic bag.
Add chicken pieces, a few at a time; shake to coat.
Reserve flour mixture. In a Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat.
Add chicken; cook until brown, 5 minutes a side.
Remove and drain on paper towels. Add onion and mushrooms; cook until tender.
Stir in the remaining seasoned flour.
Return chicken to the pan.
Add 1/2 cup water, the tomatoes with their juices and caraway seed.
Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Stir in sausage and peas to cook 10 minutes longer, or until heated through.
Serves 6.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for chicken and sausage dish, which includes both chicken and sausage components. However, it does not offer a recipe specifically for homemade chicken sausage as requested but rather a combination of chicken and pre-made sausage. The directions and ingredients are related to the preparation of a dish that includes chicken and sausage, but they do not address the creation of chicken sausage from scratch.

8 cloves coarsely chopped garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste

Directions:

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts Supreme
Ingredients:
1 pound fresh Brussels sprouts, trimmed
1 cup chopped celery
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 cup milk
1/2 cup shredded process American cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
pinch cayenne pepper, optional
Directions:
Place Brussels sprouts, celery, and a small amount of water in a saucepan; cover and cook for 8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in another saucepan, melt butter.
Stir flour until smooth.
Gradually add milk; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Add cheese, salt, and cayenne if desired; stir until cheese is melted.
Drain sprouts and celery; top with cheese sauce.
Yield:
4-6 servings.
explanation: The provided answer discusses a recipe for Brussels sprouts with a cheese sauce, which involves cooking the vegetables. However, it does not address the key aspect of making the Brussels sprouts crispy through roasting. The technique of roasting, which is crucial for achieving crispiness, is missing from the directions.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. Brussels sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Cut off stem and "X" bottom of each sprout.
Over low heat, melt the butter with olive oil in a large pot.
Add garlic; cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Add sprouts; toss with butter mixture.
Add chicken broth, salt and pepper.
Cover; cook for 10 to 15 minutes over low.
Do not overcook.
Drain; return to pot.
Before serving, toss with melted butter and parsley.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Cream And Garlic
Ingredients:
3 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and cross cut in base
1/4 cup unsalted butter
2 medium garlic cloves, minced
1 cup whipping cream
1 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Cook Brussels sprouts in large pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain, rinse under cold water and drain again.
(Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.)
Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until soft, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Do not brown.
Add Brussels sprouts, cream, salt and pepper and cook until cream thickens enough to coat Brussels sprouts, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes.
Serve hot. Yield:
8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1/8 c. hot tap water
1/3 c. brown sugar
1 1/3 c. warm water
approximately 5 c. flour
baking soda
Kosher salt
Directions:
In a large bowl place 1/8 cup hot water from tap.
Add yeast and stir until dissolved.
Add warm water and brown sugar.
Stir until dissolved.
Add flour until dough does not stick to sides of bowl.
Place dough on a floured surface and knead until smooth. Pinch off dough the size of a golf ball and roll into a rope approximately 10 inches long.
Form into shape of pretzel and place on a floured surface.
Prepare cookie sheets sprayed with Pam. Fill frying pan with water.
For every cup of water add 1 tablespoon of baking soda.
Bring water to a slow boil.
Place pretzels into slowly boiling water for approximately 30 seconds. Place pretzels on cookie sheet and salt with Kosher salt.
Bake at 475° just until golden brown.
Pretzels are best if eaten right away.
They can be frozen after the frying pan step and baked from frozen at a later date.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making homemade soft pretzels, including ingredients, measurements, and step-by-step directions, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make soft pretzels at home.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 1/3 c. warm water (105~ to 115~)
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
3 1/2 to 4 c. unsifted all-purpose flour
1 egg
1 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. coarse salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Grease 2 large baking sheets.
In a large bowl, sprinkle yeast over warm water.
Stir with rubber spatula until well blended and yeast is dissolved.
Water temperature should be between 105° and 115°.
If water is too hot, will kill yeast.
With a wooden spoon, gradually stir in sugar, salt and enough flour (about 3 1/2 cups) until a soft and slightly sticky dough forms.
explanation: The provided answer gives a comprehensive list of ingredients and outlines the initial steps for making homemade soft pretzels, including the correct water temperature for yeast activation. It directly addresses the question by providing essential information for starting the pretzel-making process, making it highly relevant.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels(Easy Enough For Children To Make)
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
4 c. all-purpose flour
1 egg, beaten
1 tsp. water
kosher salt, sesame seed or poppy seed
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water; let stand 5 minutes.
Combine next three ingredients; add to yeast mixture, mixing well.
Turn dough out onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic (about 8 minutes).
Divide into 16 portions; roll each into an 8 to 10-inch rope.
Twist each into pretzel shapes, letters or curlicues; place on ungreased baking sheets.
Combine egg with water; stir well.
Brush pretzels with egg mixture; sprinkle with kosher salt or seed.
Bake at 425° for 12 to 13 minutes or until golden brown.
Yields 16 pretzels.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making homemade soft pretzels, including all necessary ingredients, measurements, and step-by-step instructions. It directly addresses the user's question on how to make soft pretzels, making it relevant and useful.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Beef Eggplant Bake
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef for stew
1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. cooking fat
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 c. water
2 medium onions, sliced
1 tsp. dill seed
1 large eggplant (approximately 1 1/2 lb.)
2 c. boiling water
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. grated Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Cut beef cubes in 1/2-inch strips across the grain.
Combine flour, 2 teaspoons salt and pepper. Dredge meat and brown in hot fat in large frying pan, 1/3 at a time.
Drain tomatoes, reserving liquid.
Break tomatoes into pieces and set aside.
Add reserved tomato liquid, water, onions and dill seed.
Cover and cook slowly 1 hour and 15 minutes or until tender.
Add tomatoes and cook 5 minutes.
Cut eggplant into 1/2-inch slices.
Pare and place in large saucepan with boiling water and salt.
Boil 5 to 10 minutes, turning occasionally.
Remove to absorbent paper and pat dry. Combine Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs.
Sprinkle half the crumb mixture in bottom of a 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Place eggplant in layers in casserole and sprinkle with remaining crumbs.
Add meat mixture and top with Mozzarella cheese.
Cover and bake in moderate 350° oven for 15 to 20 minutes or until eggplant is done. Makes 6 to 8 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe titled 'Beef Eggplant Bake' that directly addresses the user's question about cooking with eggplant and ground beef. It lists ingredients and preparation steps that involve both eggplant and ground beef, making it a relevant response to the user's inquiry.

Brown and drain ground meat.

Title: Eggplant And Beef Casserole

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus(Chickpea Spread)
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
2 c. cooked, drained chickpeas or canned
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
3 to 5 Tbsp. tahini sauce*
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 Tbsp. olive oil
Directions:
Start your food processor and then put in garlic.
As soon as garlic is minced, put in chickpeas, lemon juice, salt, tahini and cold water.
Blend until smooth.
Add more cold water if you want it thinner.
Empty contents into a shallow 6-inch wide bowl. Smooth contents.
Sprinkle with paprika and cumin, then drizzle oil over it.
Best served at room temperature.
Dip with pita bread.
explanation: The answer provides a basic hummus recipe, which is a starting point for making hummus. However, it does not specifically address the user's request for a 'creamy roasted garlic hummus'. The inclusion of garlic is appropriate, but the lack of roasting and additional details concerning achieving the creamy texture and the unique flavor profile associated with roasted garlic make this answer only partly relevant to the user's question.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
2 to 3 ripe bananas, mashed
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Cream butter.
Gradually add sugar, medium speed.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Beat after each egg.
Stir in bananas, vanilla and cinnamon.
Combine flour and next 3 ingredients.
Gradually add to creamed mixture.
Beat until blended.
Stir in chips and walnuts. Spoon batter into loaf pan (greased).
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
Shield with foil after 1 hour.
Test with toothpick until comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes.
Remove from pan; cool completely.
Yields 1 loaf.
explanation: The answer provides a comprehensive recipe for making chocolate chip banana bread, including all the necessary ingredients and step-by-step instructions. It directly addresses the user's question about how to make this specific type of bread, making it highly relevant.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
1 beaten egg

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Chocolate Chip Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. butter (1 stick)
3 Tbsp. milk
1 c. mashed bananas
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped nuts
2 c. sifted flour
Directions:
Cream sugar, butter and egg together in large mixing bowl. Beat until fluffy.
Set aside.
Combine bananas and milk in small bowl.
Set aside.
Sift flour, baking powder and soda together. Stir by hand all ingredients, including chips and nuts.
Pour batter into greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch pan.
Bake 1 hour at 350° or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 10 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Cool on rack.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for making banana chocolate chip bread, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make chocolate chip banana bread. All the ingredients, measurements, and baking directions are relevant and specific to the query.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?

Title: Chocolate Chip-Banana Bread

1 c. sugar

1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. semi-sweet chocolate mini chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Cream butter; gradually add sugar, beating well at medium speed of an electric mixer.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition.
Stir in bananas.
Combine flour and next 3 ingredients; gradually add to creamed mixture until blended.
Stir in many marvels and walnuts.
Spoon batter into a greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes; remove from pan.
Cool completely.
explanation: The answer provided is relevant to the user's question about how to make chocolate chip banana bread. question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?

1 stick butter
3/4 c. brown sugar
2 eggs

1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. whole-wheat flour

Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Grease 9 x 5 x 3-inch bread pan. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Combine white flour, baking soda and salt. Stir in wheat flour.

Remove potatoes from baking dish with slotted spoon.
