question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Poached Eggs
Ingredients:
4 eggs
4 slices toast
butter or magarine
1 1/2 c. milk (approximately)
salt
pepper
Directions:
Heat milk slowly in a large skillet.
Add salt, pepper and 1 tablespoon butter.
Add eggs when milk is steaming (don't break yolks).
Spoon milk over eggs.
About now, put toast in toaster. Turn eggs, if necessary.
Stir milk, it will start to look like gravy.
Butter toast in plate.
Place 1 egg on each piece of toast.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?

Title: Poached Eggs Provencale
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1 medium onion, sliced

1 medium green pepper, coarsely chopped
2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. celery salt
3 or 4 drops red pepper sauce
8 eggs
Directions:
Place undrained tomatoes in 10-inch frying pan and cut them into wedges or chunks with a spoon.
Stir in all remaining ingredients except eggs.
Cook over medium heat until mixture boils.
Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes.
Carefully break eggs into simmering vegetable mixture.
Cover and cook eggs to desired doneness, 3 to 5 minutes.
Spoon eggs and vegetable mixture into serving dishes.
Makes 4 servings.

Title: Poached Fish
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water or skim milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 bay leaf
a few cloves or peppercorns
1 lb. fish fillets or steaks of your choice
Directions:
Stir together water, lemon juice, onion and seasonings in a large skillet.
Bring to a simmer.
Add fish; cover and adjust heat to maintain a simmer.
Cook 10 minutes per inch of thickness of thickest part of fish, probably 5 to 10 minutes.
Fish is done when it is opaque and flakes easily with a fork.
Don't overcook or it becomes tough and dry.
Serve hot with sauce or lemon juice or cold in chunks in salad.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing
1 tsp. minced garlic

Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside. Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.

Toss with fettuccine and mushrooms until well coated.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Broccoli, Cauliflower And Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 small head trimmed cauliflower, cut in florets
1 small bunch broccoli, trimmed and cut in florets
2 tsp. olive oil or vegetable oil
3 cloves garlic
2 1/2 thickly sliced mushrooms
2 1/2 c. whole noodles
1 c. low-fat small curd cottage cheese
1/2 c. low-fat milk
1/4 c. low-fat sour cream
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
salt and pepper
Directions:
In a large pot of boiling water, cook cauliflower and broccoli until tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
With a slotted spoon, remove vegetables and save the liquid for cooking the pasta.
In a large skillet, heat oil.
Saute garlic for 2 minutes over medium heat. Add mushrooms for about 5 minutes.
Stir in broccoli and cauliflower.
Saute for 2 to 3 minutes longer; set aside. Meanwhile in reserved boiling vegetable liquid, cook pasta.
Add water if necessary tender but until firm, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain.
In a food processor combine cottage cheese, milk, sour cream and Parmesan.
Pour over broccoli mixture, add drained pasta and toss until mixed.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.
Make 8 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?

Title: Creamy Mushrooms
Ingredients:

pinch of garlic powder
salt and white pepper
Directions:
Wash and slice mushrooms; set aside.
Melt butter over low heat, then add mushrooms, sauteing them until they are slightly brown.
Add flour; stir as you add, then slowly pour in canned milk.
Stir until you get the consistency you like.
Add garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Makes a great sauce over veggies, pasta, chicken or fish.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 c. unsifted flour
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. butter
3 to 4 Tbsp. ice water
1/3 c. finely chopped onion
1/8 tsp. white pepper
6 slices bacon, fried crisply and crumbled
1/4 lb. Swiss cheese, diced
4 eggs, beaten
2 c. light cream
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Combine flour and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Cut in 1/3 cup butter until mixture resembles coarse meal. Gradually stir in ice water until mixture forms a ball.
Roll dough out on lightly floured board to fit 10-inch pie plate. Transfer to plate and shape edges.
Saute onion in 1 tablespoon butter until tender.
Set aside to cool.
Line crust with bacon and cheese.
Combine eggs, cream, remaining salt and spices and sauteed onion.
Pour into crust.
Bake at 375° about 35 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Serve hot!
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making a classic Quiche Lorraine, including all necessary ingredients and step-by-step instructions. It directly addresses the question by providing a clear and complete process for the preparation of the dish, fulfilling the user's request for how to make a classic Quiche Lorraine.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. butter
2 Tbsp. ice water
3 eggs
1 1/4 c. whipping cream
1 tsp. mixed herbs
dash of black pepper
dash of salt
1 c. diced smoked ham
1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar or Jarlsberg cheese
dash of paprika
Directions:
Measure flour into a bowl.
Cut in butter with a pastry blender until coarse crumbs form.
Add ice water, mixing with a fork until dough forms a ball.
Wrap.
Chill for 1 hour.
Roll dough out to fit bottom and sides of a 9-inch quiche pan.
Prick dough with a fork.
Bake pie shell at 425° for about 10 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a quiche, which includes ingredients and directions that could be used for a classic quiche Lorraine. However, it lacks specific instructions for the Lorraine aspect such as incorporating onions and bacon, which are traditional to the recipe. question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine(Makes 8 Servings)
Ingredients:
1 unbaked 9-inch (4-cup volume) deep-dish pie shell
6 slices bacon, chopped
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded Swiss cheese
1 (12 fluid oz.) can evaporated milk
3 large eggs, well beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground black pepper
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Cook bacon in large skillet over medium heat. When bacon starts to turn brown, add onion. Cook until bacon is crisp; drain. Sprinkle cheese into bottom of pie shell. Top with bacon mixture. Combine milk, eggs, salt, pepper and nutmeg in small bowl until blended. Pour into pie shell. Bake 30 to 35 minutes or until knife inserted halfway between center and edge comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question of making a classic quiche Lorraine. It includes the list of ingredients, the quantities, and step-by-step directions for preparation, baking, and serving, which are all essential elements for creating the dish.

Ingredients:

12 slices bacon, fried
1 c. cooked mushrooms or vegetables
4 whole eggs
2 c. cream
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of cayenne pepper
dash of black pepper
1 deep-dish pastry
Directions:

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola Bars
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. rolled oats
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. raw sunflower seeds
1/4 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. slivered almonds

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Soft Granola Bars
Ingredients:
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs
2 c. quick cooking or regular oats
1 1/2 c. Gold Medal whole wheat flour
1 c. raisins or cut up dates
1 c. chopped nuts or flaked coconut
1 1/2 tsp. each ground cinnamon and ground cloves, if desired
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
Honey Glaze
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Grease jelly roll pan, 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch.
Mix brown sugar, oil and eggs in large bowl with spoon until smooth.
Stir in remaining ingredients except Honey Glaze. Spread in pan with spatula, patting evenly with hand.
Bake just until center is set but not firm, 17 to 22 minutes; cool 15 minutes.
Drizzle evenly with Honey Glaze; cool completely.
Cut into bars, about 3 x 1 1/2-inches.
Makes 40 bars.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for 'Soft Granola Bars' which are a type of granola bar. While it includes a list of ingredients and some steps for making these bars, it does not explicitly state that these are 'homemade granola bars' or address the method for creating traditional granola bars. The term 'Soft Granola Bars' might imply a different style or variation of granola bars, which may not be the specific type of homemade granola bars the user is seeking.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
4 c. uncooked oatmeal (quick type)
1 c. chopped peanuts (no skins)
1/2 c. Grape-Nuts
1/2 c. bran (unprocessed, uncooked)
sugar substitute to equal 1/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Spread the oatmeal on a cookie sheet and heat in a 350° oven for 10 minutes.
Combine all but the last two ingredients.
Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet or pan for 20 minutes, stirring once to brown evenly.
Allow mixture to cook in the oven.
Add wheat germ and raisins.
Refrigerate in glass jars or plastic containers.
(Granulated sugar substitute was more acceptable than liquid sugar substitute in this product.)
explanation: The answer provides a list of ingredients and some baking instructions, which are relevant to making granola. question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Granola Bars
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oleo or butter
1/4 c. honey
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. quick cooking oats
1/2 c. chopped nuts
1/2 c. brown sugar, packed
1 egg
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. flaked coconut
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Grease bottom of 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.
Melt butter in saucepan over low heat.
Remove from heat. Stir in remaining ingredients (sugar, honey, egg, flour, soda, cinnamon, salt, oats, coconut and nuts).
This mixture will be thick.
Press in prepared pan.
Bake 20 minutes.
Cool in pan. Cut into 32 bars.

Directions:

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Easy Moussaka
Ingredients:
3 medium size eggplants
1 c. butter or margarine

3 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. dry red wine
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
salt to taste
freshly ground pepper to taste

4 eggs, beaten until frothy
nutmeg to taste

1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplants; slice 1/2-inch thick.
Brown slices quickly in large, heavy skillet in 4 tablespoons butter (more as needed). Set aside.
Heat 4 tablespoons butter in same skillet.
Cook onions until lightly browned.
Add ground meat; cook for 10 minutes.
Combine tomato paste with wine, parsley, cinnamon, salt and pepper; stir into meat.
Simmer, stirring frequently, until all liquid has been absorbed.
Remove from heat.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Rice Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. garlic, chopped
2 medium onions, sliced
4 c. V-8 juice (low sodium)
4 c. water
8 vegetable bouillon cubes (small cubes that make 1 c. each)
2 c. each: frozen green beans, peas, corn and carrots
1 c. brown rice, cooked according to pkg. directions
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can white kidney beans
Directions:
In an 8-quart saucepan, heat oil, garlic and onions over medium high heat.
Saute 5 to 6 minutes or until onions are clear. Add V-8 juice, water, bouillon cubes and vegetables.
Heat until soup comes to a boil.
Add rice and kidney beans.
Allow to heat through.
Remove from heat and serve.
Makes 10 to 12 servings.

Title: Wild Rice With Vegetables
Ingredients:
1/4 c. wild rice
1 c. water
1/4 c. diced onion
1/4 c. brown rice
4 oz. can sliced mushrooms
2 small garlic cloves, minced
1 tsp. beef bouillon granules
1 medium sweet yellow or green pepper, diced
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a saucepan except peppers.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and cover.
Simmer 40 minutes.
Stir in pepper.
Simmer covered 10 minutes more.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Crunchy Brown Rice
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. nonfat, low sodium chicken or vegetable broth
3 to 4 green onions, chopped
1 c. brown rice
1 tomato, chopped
1/4 c. fresh or frozen corn
2 to 4 Tbsp. canned diced green chiles
1 Tbsp. Dijon style mustard
1/4 c. chopped water chestnuts
Directions:
Combine stock or broth and green onions in saucepan.
Bring to boil and add rice.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer 45 minutes. Uncover.
Stir in corn, tomatoes, chestnuts, green chiles and mustard.
Serve warm.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Beef
Ingredients:
2 small boxes frozen broccoli
2 lb. ground beef
2 c. (8 oz.) tomatoes
1 medium bell pepper
1/2 medium onion
1/2 c. catsup (ketchup)
1/2 c. French salad dressing
salt and pepper as desired
grated sharp or medium sharp Cheddar cheese or low-fat cheese of choice
Directions:
Grate Cheddar cheese.
Cut up and dice onion and bell pepper. In a large skillet, cook ground beef, onion, pepper and thawed broccoli together until beef is brown and broccoli is cooked, yet still crisp.
Drain off any excess fat.
Put back in skillet and add the remaining ingredients.
Bring to boil; afterwards lower heat to a good simmer.
Simmer for 10 full minutes (or until thickened somewhat).
Serve over cooked rice or pasta.
(You may substitute low-fat ground turkey for a low-fat family meal, if desired.)
Top with grated cheese on individual servings. Delicious!
explanation: The provided answer is directly relevant to the question. It offers a complete recipe for cooking 'Broccoli Beef' using ground beef and broccoli as main ingredients. The ingredients list includes both components as required, and the directions detail how to cook them together, fulfilling the user's query for a dish that can be prepared with these specific ingredients.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef Broccoli Supper
Ingredients:
3/4 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 lb. ground beef
1 1/2 c. fresh broccoli florets
1 can (10.75 oz) condensed broccoli cheese soup, undiluted
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt-free seasoning blend
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
Directions:
Cook rice according to package directions.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain.
Add the rice, broccoli, soup, milk, seasoning blend, salt and pepper; stir until combined.
Transfer to a greased 2-quart baking dish.
Toss bread crumbs and butter; sprinkle over beef mixture.
Cover and bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Uncover; bake 5 to 10 minutes longer or until heated through.
Serves 4 to 6.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe (Beef Broccoli Supper) that uses both ground beef and broccoli as primary ingredients. The listed ingredients and step-by-step directions directly address the user's question of what to cook with these two items, making it a relevant response.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Beef Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1 1/4 c. milk
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 beaten egg
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, cooked and well-drained
2 crust (9-inch) pie
4 oz. Mozzarella cheese, sliced
milk
Directions:
Brown beef and onion.
Drain off fat.
Stir in flour, salt and garlic.
Add milk and softened cream cheese.
Cook and stir until bubbly.
Add moderate amount of hot mixture to beaten egg. Return to mixture in skillet.
Cook until thickened, 1 to 2 minutes.
Stir in broccoli.
Set aside.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that involves ground beef and broccoli, which aligns with the user's question about what to cook with these ingredients. However, it introduces additional ingredients and steps (such as flour, cream cheese, pie crust, and milk) that were not mentioned in the user's question. This suggests that while the recipe is relevant, it is not a direct answer to the user's query as it includes extra components.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef Broccoli Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
3 oz. softened cream cheese
10 oz. frozen chopped broccoli, cooked and drained
1/4 c. chopped onions
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. milk
1 egg, beaten
4 oz. Monterey Jack cheese
2 pkg. crescent rolls
Directions:
Brown meat and onions; drain fat.
Stir into meat flour, salt and garlic salt.
Add milk and cream cheese.
Cook, stirring until smooth and thick.
Add egg; stir.
Continue cooking on medum-high until thick.
Stir in cooked broccoli.
Roll 1 package crescent roll dough into a rectangle on flour board.
Line pie plate or rectangular 8 x 8-inch pan.
Spoon in meat mixture; cover with layer of Monterey Jack cheese slices.
Roll out second package crescent rolls for top.
Cover pan with dough; cut slits into top. Brush with milk.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
If top browns too fast, cover with foil last 20 minutes.
Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a Beef Broccoli Pie which does involve ground beef and broccoli. However, it does not directly address the question of what can be cooked with these ingredients alone, as it requires additional ingredients and a specific method. Hence, the answer partially addresses the question by offering a dish that includes both components but doesn't consider simpler or other ways to cook them separately.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef-Broccoli Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, chopped, cooked and drained
4 oz. Monterey Jack cheese
1/4 c. chopped onion
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. milk
1 egg, beaten
2 recipes plain pastry
milk
Directions:
In a skillet, brown beef and onion; drain off fat.
Stir in flour, salt and garlic salt.
Add 1 1/4 cups of milk and the softened cream cheese.
Cook and stir until smooth and bubbly. Stir about 1 cup of the hot mixture into the beaten egg; return to mixture skillet.
Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture is thickened, 1/2 minute.
Stir in cooked, chopped broccoli; set aside.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that includes ground beef and broccoli, which are ingredients mentioned in the user's question. question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Herbed Steak
Ingredients:
1 round steak
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. ketchup
1 1/2 tsp. basil leaves
1 tsp. oregano leaves
1 Tbsp. garlic chips
Directions:
Mix all ingredients and brush all over steak. Salt and pepper. Refrigerate at least 5 hours; no longer than 24 hours. Cook at 250° for 3 hours.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that includes herbs, which are relevant to a garlic herb butter. question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Grilled Steak With Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. minced fresh shallots
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh chives
1 tsp. chopped fresh tarragon
1/2 tsp. coarsely ground pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. softened butter
4 beef porterhouse or T-Bone steaks
Directions:
In 1-quart saucepan, stir all ingredients except butter and steaks.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until all liquid has evaporated (5 to 6 minutes).
Set aside and cool completely.
In small bowl, stir together butter and cooked, cooled herbs.
Place mixture on waxed paper; shape into 4-inch log.
Refrigerate until serving.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for making herb butter, which is a component of garlic herb butter for steak. question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. minced green onion
1 c. dry wine
1/2 c. butter, softened
2 tsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook onion and wine in a small saucepan until the liquid is reduced to 1/4 cup.
Remove from heat and cool.
With beater, cream butter and parsley.
Gradually beat in the wine mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Makes 3/4 cup butter.
explanation: The answer provided is related to making butter with herbs and wine, which could be part of a garlic herb butter recipe. question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. broccoli (can use fresh)
1 chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1 (3 oz.) cream cheese
1 c. milk
3/4 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Cook broccoli and onion together for 5 minutes.
In saucepan, melt butter or margarine and mix in flour, salt, pepper and milk. Cook and stir until bubbly.
Blend in cream cheese until smooth. Place broccoli and onion mix in 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.
Pour cream cheese mixture on top of broccoli.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 30 to 35 minutes. (This is my favorite of all broccoli casseroles.)
explanation: The answer provided is directly relevant to the user's question about making a cheesy broccoli casserole. It lists the ingredients needed and gives clear, step-by-step directions for preparing the dish, including cooking times and temperatures. The user's question is fully addressed, making this a relevant response.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 1/2 lb. fresh broccoli
2 eggs, slightly beaten

Directions:
Wash and trim broccoli; cut stalks into spears.
Cook broccoli, covered in a small amount of boiling unsalted water about 10 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Drain.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chopped frozen broccoli
1 c. Minute rice
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 c. milk
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (6 oz. can) water chestnuts, drained and sliced
Directions:
Cook broccoli by package directions; drain and set aside. Combine rice, soup, milk, cheese, salt and pepper.
Heat until cheese is melted and ingredients are well blended, then add onion, celery, water chestnuts and broccoli.
Stir thoroughly.
Place in a lightly greased 10 x 6 x 2-inch baking dish and heat in a 350° oven for about 30 minutes.
Fifteen minutes before removing from oven, cover top with finely crushed cracker crumbs.
explanation: The answer provides a clear and detailed recipe for making a cheesy broccoli casserole, including the ingredients and step-by-step instructions. It directly addresses the user's question, making it highly relevant.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. chopped onion
6 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
1/2 c. water
2 pkg. frozen broccoli, thawed and drained
3 eggs, well beaten
1/2 c. soda cracker crumbs
1 can onion rings (optional)
Directions:
Fry onion in butter.
Stir in flour; add water and cook over low heat, stirring, until mixture thickens and comes to a boil. Blend in cheese and add broccoli.
Mix in eggs until gently blended.
Use 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.
Cover with crackers and dot with butter before baking.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Makes 8 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for a broccoli casserole, which is relevant to the question about making a cheesy broccoli casserole. It lists the ingredients, including cheese, and provides step-by-step directions, thus covering the essential components of the question.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. onion, finely chopped
6 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. water
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
2 pkg. chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
3 eggs, well beaten
1/2 c. soda cracker crumbs
Directions:
Saute onion in 4 tablespoons butter until soft.
Stir in flour.
Add water.
Cook over low heat, stirring until mixture thickens and comes to a boil.
Blend in Cheez Whiz and combine sauce with broccoli.
Add eggs and mix gently until blended.
Turn into 1 1/2-quart greased casserole.
Cover with crumbs and dot with remaining butter.
Bake covered at 325° for 1 hour.
Makes 8 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making a broccoli casserole, which includes cheese (Cheez Whiz) as a key ingredient, aligning with the user's request for a cheesy broccoli casserole. It matches the question's context by offering the necessary ingredients and steps to prepare the dish.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Grilled Vegetable Salad
Ingredients:
1/3 c. balsamic vinegar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 shallots, finely chopped
1 tsp. dried Italian seasoning
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. molasses
1/2 lb. carrots, scraped
1 sweet red pepper
1 sweet yellow pepper
2 zucchini
2 yellow squash
1 large onion
Directions:
Combine first 7 ingredients in a large bowl.
Set aside.
Cut remaining vegetables into large pieces and add to vinegar mixture, tossing to coat.
Let stand 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain, reserving vinegar mixture.
Arrange in a grill basket. Cook, covered with grill lid, over medium-hot coals (350° to 400°) for 15 to 20 minutes, turning occasionally.
Return vegetables to reserved vinegar mixture, tossing gently.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Makes 6 cups.
explanation: The provided answer gives a detailed recipe for a grilled vegetable salad, which does address the user's question about how to make a classic grilled vegetable salad. However, it lacks a brief introduction or explanation that a classic grilled vegetable salad typically includes, such as a mention of serving it as a side dish or incorporating dressing and herbs that are common in such recipes. The step-by-step cooking instructions are relevant, but the answer could be enhanced by including additional information on the expected outcome or presentation of the dish.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Grill-Side Garden Salad
Ingredients:
2 medium tomatoes, seeded and chopped (about 2 c.)
1 medium zucchini, diced (about 1 c.)
1 c. frozen whole kernel corn, thawed *
1/3 c. thinly sliced green onions with tops
1 small ripe avocado, peeled, seeded and coarsely chopped
1/3 c. Pace picante sauce
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro or parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon or lime juice
3/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. ground cumin
Directions:
Combine tomatoes, zucchini, corn, green onions and avocado in large bowl.
Combine remaining ingredients; mix well.
Pour over vegetable mixture and mix gently.
Chill 3 to 4 hours, occasionally stirring gently.
Stir gently and serve chilled or at room temperature with additional picante sauce.
Makes 4 to 6 servings, about 4 cups salad.
explanation: The provided answer is titled 'Grill-Side Garden Salad' and includes a list of ingredients and directions that seem suitable for a grilled vegetable salad. question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Potato Salad
Ingredients:
6 medium red potatoes
3 Tbsp. Crisco oil
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 tsp. freeze dried chives
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/3 c. chopped celery
1/3 c. chopped onion
2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 tsp. prepared mustard
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Cool slightly.
Peel and slice potatoes.
Place in medium serving bowl.
Combine Crisco oil, vinegar, chives, sugar, salt and pepper in small bowl.
Stir until blended.
Pour over potatoes.
Cover.
Refrigerate about 2 hours.
Add celery, onion, eggs and parsley.
Mix well.
Combine mayonnaise and mustard in small bowl.
Stir into potato mixture. Cover.
Refrigerate at least 2 hours.
explanation: The provided answer is for a classic potato salad recipe, which is unrelated to the user's question about making a classic grilled vegetable salad. The ingredients and instructions do not include any vegetables to be grilled or a salad preparation, thus it completely misses the context of the user's query.

answer:
Title: Classic Potato Salad
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. salt

1 medium onion, diced
1 c. celery, diced
1/2 c. green pepper, diced
2 Tbsp. sugar

Let cool.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Peppers Stuffed With Sausage
Ingredients:
6 bell peppers
1/2 lb. sausage meat
2 c. cooked rice
1 tsp. salt
1 c. tomatoes
1/2 c. boiling water
Directions:
Wash peppers and remove seeds.
Boil for 5 minutes in water to cover.
Remove from water and fill with the meat, rice, salt and strained tomatoes which have been mixed together.
Place in baking dish, add the boiling water and bake at 400° for 1 hour.
Yields 6 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a clear and specific recipe that uses both sausage and bell peppers, directly addressing the user's question. It includes all necessary ingredients and step-by-step directions to prepare the dish, making it highly relevant to the inquiry.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
3 medium-size bell peppers
3 medium-size onions
1 pkg. hot Italian sausage
1 pkg. sweet Italian sausage
1 can tomato sauce (29 oz.)
Directions:
Cover bottom of large frying pan with cooking oil of your choice.
Slice peppers and onions lengthwise and saute on low heat until tender.
Cut sausage links into chunks.
Can be fried in separate pan from peppers and onions or placed on a broiler pan in oven at 350° until done.
Once peppers and onions are tender, add 1 cup of water and let them remain cooking for approximately 5 minutes.
Drain.
This method reserves a lot of the excess oil. Pour tomato sauce into crock-pot or large pot and heat.
Add cooked peppers, onions and sausage.
Makes a great hoagie roll filler or serve with pasta of your choice.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for cooking with sausage and bell peppers, which directly addresses the user's question. It lists ingredients, provides instructions for preparation, and suggests ways to serve the dish, making it highly relevant to the query.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?

1/2 c. milk
small amount of onions
1 small bell pepper
1 lb. cooked sausage, slightly drained
dash of salt
1 can mushroom soup
1/3 c. pimiento
Directions:

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Italian Sausages And Peppers
Ingredients:
6 bell peppers, sliced lengthwise
3 sliced onions
1/2 c. oil
6 Italian sausages
1 large can peeled tomatoes
Directions:
Fry sausages in 1/2 cup oil for 5 minutes.
Remove from pan and slice when cool.
In same oil that sausages were cooked in, add sliced onions and peppers.
Cook for 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes and sausages and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add salt and pepper to taste (garlic salt and parsley may also be added to taste).
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe titled 'Italian Sausages And Peppers,' which directly addresses the user's question about cooking with sausage and bell peppers. question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
1 lb. Italian sausage links
6 green or red bell peppers, cut into strips
3 large onions, sliced
salt
1/4 c. dry red or white wine
Directions:
Prick sausage links several times with fork.
In skillet, brown sausage well.
Drain and reserve 3 tablespoons drippings.
Slice sausage.
Set aside.
In the drippings, cook the peppers and onions.
Cover for 5 minutes.
Uncover and cook until the vegetables are tender but not brown.
Season to taste with salt. Add the sausage and wine; heat through.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for cooking with sausage and bell peppers, giving specific ingredients and step-by-step cooking directions. It directly addresses the user's question by presenting a method to combine sausage and bell peppers into a dish, making it relevant and useful for someone seeking a recipe for these ingredients.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crispy Baked Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. lemon pepper
1/2 c. saltine or club style crackers
1/2 c. potato chips
1 lb. crappie fillets
Directions:
Melt the butter and pour into a shallow bowl.
Add the paprika and lemon pepper.
Crush the crackers and the potato chips.
Mix them together in a small bowl and pour the crumbs onto a plate or waxed paper.
Dip the fish fillets in the butter mixture and coat with the crumbs.
Place the fillets in a single layer in a shallow baking pan.
Bake at 350° for 8 minutes for small fillets and 10 minutes for large.
Turn the oven to broil and cook the fish for 5 to 7 minutes or until nicely browned.
Serves 4.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the user's question about making crispy fish fillets. It offers a specific recipe with clearly listed ingredients and step-by-step cooking instructions that include using butter, paprika, lemon pepper, and crumbs to achieve a crispy texture. The cooking times are also mentioned, ensuring that the fillets will become crispy as requested. Therefore, this response fully satisfies the query with relevant and useful information for creating crispy fish fillets.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crispy Fish Fillets(Low Cholesterol)
Ingredients:
1 lb. fish fillets
2 egg whites, beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of ground pepper
1/4 c. cornmeal or 1/3 c. cornflake crumbs
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
lemon wedges (optional)
3 Tbsp. flour
1/4 c. lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 500°.
Soak fillets in equal parts lemon juice and water.
Combine egg whites and water in shallow dish.
Combine flour, salt and pepper in another shallow dish.
Dry fish. Sprinkle each side with flour mix.
Dip in egg whites and dredge in cornmeal.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question about making crispy fish fillets. It lists both ingredients and detailed steps that include preheating the oven, soaking the fish, a process of combining flour mix with the fish, and finally cooking with vegetable oil. These instructions are relevant and practical for achieving the desired crispy texture for fish fillets.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?

Ingredients:

1/4 c. margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper

Directions:

Place fish in square baking pan.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crispy Baked Fillets
Ingredients:
1 lb. fish fillets
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 Tbsp. oil
1/3 c. cornflake crumbs
Directions:
Preheat oven to 500°.
Wash and dry fillets and cut into serving pieces.
Season, dip in oil and coat with cornflake crumbs.
Arrange in a single layer in a lightly oiled shallow baking dish.
Bake 10 minutes without turning or basting.
explanation: The provided answer offers a recipe for making crispy fish fillets by detailing the ingredients and steps involved, which directly addresses the user's question. question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crispy Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine, melted
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. crushed saltine crackers
1/4 c. crushed potato chips
4 fish fillets, thawed if frozen (about 1 lb. cod, flounder, turbot or halibut)
lemon slices
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Combine margarine, paprika and salt in bowl.
Place crackers and potato chip crumbs on waxed paper.
Dip fillets in margarine, then in crumbs, coating well.
Place in shallow baking pan in single layer.
Bake 10 minutes, then broil 5-inches from broiler for 6 to 8 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily with fork.
Serve with lemon slices.
Makes 4 servings.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question of making crispy fish fillets. It lists the necessary ingredients, provides step-by-step instructions for preparation, and specifies the cooking method, which includes baking and broiling to achieve a crispy texture. Additionally, the quantities and serving information are appropriate for the recipe.

plate

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?

Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. butter
salt and pepper
Directions:
Crack eggs in a small bowl.
Mix with a fork.
Melt butter in a frying pan over low heat.
Pour in eggs.
Stir evenly until cooked.
Shake a little salt and pepper to taste.
Careful, not too much!

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Baked Scrambled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 eggs
1/3 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 lb. process cheese (Velveeta), cubed
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°. Butter a deep 1-quart glass casserole. In a bowl, combine ingredients. Beat until frothy. Stir in cheese. Bake 30 minutes until brown and fluffy. Serves 6.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Scrambled Eggs
Ingredients:
5 Tbsp. butter or margarine, divided
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
2 c. milk
2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
1 c. sliced, fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
12 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped broccoli, cooked and drained
1 c. soft bread crumbs
Directions:
In a saucepan, melt 2 tablespoons butter. Add flour; cook and stir until the mixture begins to bubble. Gradually stir in milk; bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat. Stir in the cheese until melted; set aside. In a large skillet, saute mushrooms and onion in 2 tablespoons of butter until tender. Add eggs and salt; cook and stir until the eggs are completely set. Add the cheese sauce and broccoli; mix well. Pour into a greased 11 x 7 x 2-inch baking dish.
explanation: The answer provided details a recipe for a variation of scrambled eggs, including ingredients and instructions. However, it does not specifically address how to make 'fluffy' scrambled eggs, which usually involves techniques such as adding milk, whisking vigorously, or cooking at a lower temperature. The inclusion of cooked broccoli and bread crumbs deviates from the simplicity often required for fluffy scrambled eggs. question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
3/4 c. milk
2 c. fruit
1 c. flour
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. salt
1 stick butter
Directions:
Make batter of 1 cup sugar, flour, milk, baking powder and salt.
Melt butter in baking pan.
Pour batter in butter; add fruit.
Mix rest of sugar, water and pinch of salt together and pour over batter and fruit.
Bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a list of ingredients and some basic steps for making peach cobbler, but it lacks specific information on how to prepare the cobbler from scratch, such as details on preparing the fruit, making the biscuit topping, and possibly other steps that are typically involved in a traditional peach cobbler recipe. question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Easy Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. sweet milk (2% or whole)
1/2 c. butter or oleo
2 lb. peaches
1 c. water
1 c. sugar
Directions:
Mix first four ingredients.
Gradually stir in milk and butter.
Mix peaches, water and sugar in another bowl (use no more than 2 cups liquid).
In a 9 x 13-inch baking pan, melt butter. Pour batter in pan then pour fruit over batter.
During baking, batter will rise to top.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until top is well browned.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making peach cobbler from scratch, including ingredients and step-by-step instructions. It directly addresses the user's question about how to make peach cobbler, making it relevant and useful.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
5 c. sliced peaches
1/2 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. flour
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
1 egg, beaten
light cream
Directions:
Make filling:
In medium bowl, combine first 8 ingredients, turn into 8 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish.
Preheat oven to 375°.
Make batter:
Combine next 7 ingredients.
Mix with wooden spoon until smooth.
Drop in 9 portions over filling, spacing evenly.
Batter will spread during baking.
Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until peaches are tender.
Serve with cream.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question about making a peach cobbler from scratch. It lists the exact ingredients required and provides step-by-step directions for creating both the filling and the batter, which are integral parts of the recipe. The response also indicates the baking time and suggests serving with cream, which is common for serving peach cobbler.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. sliced peaches (raw)
1/4 c. water
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1 Tbsp. shortening
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
light cream
Directions:
In saucepan, combine peaches, water and 1/2 cup of sugar. Bring to a boil.
Keep hot.
Beat egg, 1/2 cup of sugar and shortening until fluffy.
Add milk.
Stir in flour, baking powder and salt.
Spread batter in greased baking dish.
Pour hot peaches over the batter.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until fruit is tender.
Serve with cream.
Serves 6.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making peach cobbler, including all necessary ingredients and step-by-step directions. It directly addresses the user's question about how to make the dessert from scratch.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Fresh Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. thinly sliced fresh peaches
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. shortening
1 Tbsp. milk
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In saucepan, combine peaches, water and 1/2 cup sugar.
Bring to boil and stir.
Keep hot.
With spoon, beat egg, 1/2 cup sugar and shortening until fluffy.
Add milk; stir in flour, baking powder and salt.
Spread batter in a greased 8-inch square pan, then pour hot peaches over the batter.
Bake at 375° for 25 to 30 minutes or until tender.
Serve warm with cream, if desired. Serves 4 to 6.
explanation: The provided answer gives a complete recipe for making peach cobbler from scratch, including the list of ingredients and step-by-step directions. It directly addresses the user's question about how to prepare a peach cobbler, making it relevant and useful.

1/2 c. vegetable oil

1/4 tsp. dry mustard

Shake oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, pepper, mustard and garlic in tightly covered jar. Pour over tomatoes.
Cover and refrigerate, spooning dressing over tomatoes occasionally, at least 2 hours.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Layered Vegetable Vinaigrette(Serves 8. Preparation :20.  Stand 1:00.  Total 1:20.)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vinegar
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. Dijon mustard
fresh ground black pepper (to taste)
4 carrots
1 lb. green beans
2 tomatoes
2 cucumbers
1/4 lb. mushrooms
Directions:
Mix dressing (first 4 ingredients) in a jar. Shake well. Scrub or peel carrots and slice into rounds. Steam green beans for 5 minutes; drain. Slice tomatoes, cucumbers and mushrooms into slices. Layer vegetables in a serving dish and top with dressing. Refrigerate 1 hour or more before serving.
explanation: The provided answer is about a layered vegetable vinaigrette recipe, which includes a list of ingredients and steps for a specific salad. question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Our Favorite Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. prepared Dijon style mustard
4 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
minced parsley and/or snipped fresh chives to taste
1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Measure mustard into a bowl.
Whisk in vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper and herbs to taste.
Continue to whisk mixture while slowly dribbling in olive oil until mixture thickens.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
Cover until ready to use.
(Vinaigrette is best if made just before it is to be used.)
If necessary, whisk again before serving.
Makes 1 cup.
explanation: The answer provides a step-by-step recipe for creating a vinaigrette, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make a simple vinaigrette. It includes all the necessary ingredients and instructions, making it a relevant and useful response.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.

Title: Simple Southern Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 frying chicken, cut up
3 t. Lawry's Seasoned Salt
2 garlic cloves, finely chopped
1 c. all purpose flour
1 c. vegetable oil
Directions:
Season chicken pieces with seasoned salt and garlic.
Roll chicken in flour until covered.
Shake off excess flour.
Sprinkle with additional seasonings.
Fry chicken in vegetable oil in frying pan.
Begin with oil very hot and then reduce the heat later.
This seals in the juices and flavor then cooks it.
explanation: The provided answer is completely unrelated to the user's request for a beef stir-fry recipe. Instead, it provides a recipe for Southern Fried Chicken, which does not involve beef or stir-frying cooking method.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef top round steak
1 1/2 c. broccoli (1-inch size)
3 medium carrots
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion
1 c. frozen peas
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
4 to 6 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Slice beef very thin in bite size strips.
Add cooking oil to preheated hot wok (high heat).
Stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onion in hot oil for 2 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Remove from wok.
Add more oil, if necessary, before stir-frying the beef strips (fry only 1/2 of the portion of beef strips at a time) in hot oil (high heat) for 2 to 3 minutes.
Return all meat to wok. Add peas, water chestnuts and bamboo shoots.
explanation: The provided answer is a recipe for Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry, which directly answers the request for a simple beef stir-fry recipe. It lists all necessary ingredients and provides clear, step-by-step directions, making it a relevant and useful response to the question.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef round steak, sliced thin
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut into pieces
3 medium carrots, sliced
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
Directions:

Mix cornstarch, salt, sugar, soy sauce and sherry; set aside.

Remove from wok.
Add beef and cook for 2 to 3 minutes.
Remove beef.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, sliced
1 clove garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3 c. water or chicken stock
8 oz. dried lentils
1 tsp. salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil over medium heat until onions are tender. Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice. Simmer about 5 more minutes. Serves 4.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant to the user's question as it offers a specific recipe, Lentil Soup With Spinach, using lentils and spinach as primary ingredients. This directly addresses the user's query about what they can cook with these two ingredients.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 c. water
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can cut tomatoes
4 tsp. vegetable bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt and thyme
1/4 tsp. fennel seed and pepper
1 bay leaf
2 medium chopped carrots (1 c.)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Rinse lentils; set aside.
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven cook onion and garlic until tender, not brown.
Stir in lentils, water, tomatoes, bouillon, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme, fennel seed, pepper and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and frozen spinach. Bring to a boil, breaking up spinach with a fork; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add vinegar; discard bay leaf.
Makes 4 servings.
explanation: The provided answer is directly related to the user's question. It offers a specific recipe titled 'Lentil-Spinach Stew,' which includes both lentils and spinach as main ingredients. The answer outlines the ingredients and provides step-by-step directions for cooking, thereby giving the user a practical way to prepare a dish using these two components.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Spinach
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils (1 c.)
1 lb. spinach, chopped
1 onion
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. coriander
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. chili powder
lemon juice to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the lentils in 1 pint (2 cups) water until soft (about 25 minutes).
Fry sliced onion and chopped garlic; add spices.
Stir about 2 minutes.
Add cooked lentils and washed and coarsely chopped spinach.
Stir well.
Simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Add salt and lemon juice.
explanation: The answer provides a relevant and detailed recipe that uses both lentils and spinach as main ingredients. It includes a list of ingredients, preparation steps, and cooking directions, which directly address the user's question about what they can cook with these two ingredients.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced onions
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 lb. dry lentils
1 lb. frozen, chopped spinach
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
3 c. water
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil in 3-quart saucepan over medium heat until onions are tender.
Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice.
Cover and simmer until spinach is tender, about 5 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe, Lentil Soup With Spinach, which directly addresses the user's question about what to cook with lentils and spinach. The ingredients and directions are tailored to include both lentils and spinach, making it a relevant and useful response.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. pkg. lentils
1 pkg. frozen spinach
1 small chopped onion
1 stalk celery, chopped
1 carrot, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
8 c. water
1 bouillon cube
2 Tbsp. vinegar
freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large soup pot or crock-pot. Cook on low for 6 hours.
If using a crock-pot, set crock-pot to high and cook 6 hours.
Add ground pepper to taste.
Can also add two chopped Italian sausages to ingredients for different flavor before cooking.
explanation: The answer provided is relevant to the question as it offers a recipe (Lentil Spinach Soup) that specifically uses lentils and spinach as its primary ingredients. The recipe includes all the necessary components and instructions to make the dish, directly addressing what the user can cook with these two ingredients.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 Tbsp. molasses
2/3 c. orange juice
2 c. canned or cooked mashed pumpkin
3 1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. ground cloves
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Beat butter at medium speed of mixer.
Gradually add sugar; beat well.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add molasses, orange juice and pumpkin.
Combine flour and next 5 ingredients.
Add to creamed mixture; mix until blended.
Stir in vanilla, raisins and nuts.
explanation: The answer provided is a complete recipe for spiced pumpkin bread, which directly addresses the user's question about a good recipe for spiced pumpkin bread. It includes all the necessary ingredients and detailed steps for making the bread, ensuring that the user can follow the recipe to achieve the desired result.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 c. cooked or canned pumpkin
2/3 c. orange juice
2 Tbsp. molasses
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 to 1 tsp. ground cloves
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
In
mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add the pumpkin, orange juice, molasses and vanilla. Combine dry ingredients. Add to the creamed mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into two greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3 loaf pans. Bake at 350° for 65 to 75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes. Remove from pans onto wire racks.
explanation: The provided answer contains a complete recipe for spiced pumpkin bread, which directly addresses the user's request for a good recipe for spiced pumpkin bread. It lists all necessary ingredients and includes step-by-step directions, making it a fully relevant response to the question.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Bread
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
4 eggs, lightly beaten
1 can (16 oz.) solid-packed pumpkin
3 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
2 t. baking soda
1 t. baking powder
1 t. salt
1 t. ground cinnamon
1 t. ground nutmeg
1/2 t. ground cloves
1/2 t. ground allspice
1/2 c. water
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine sugar, oil and eggs.
Add pumpkin and mix well.
Combine dry ingredients; add to the pumpkin mixture alternately with water.
Pour into
two greased 9-in. 5-in.x3-in. loaf pans.
Bake at 350° for 60-70 minutes or until bread tests done.
Cool in pans 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack; cool completely.
Yields 2 loaves.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for spiced pumpkin bread, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions. It explicitly mentions 'pumpkin spice bread,' which directly corresponds to the user's question. Therefore, the information provided is relevant and directly answers the user's query.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Bread
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
1 egg, beaten
1/2 c. melted margarine
1 c. pumpkin
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Mix by hand.
Sift dry ingredients together.
Make a well in center.
Add margarine and combine pumpkin, egg and water.
Mix until dry ingredients are moistened.
Pour into greased and floured 9 x 5-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until done.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe for pumpkin bread, which includes spices like cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves, addressing the user's request for a spiced pumpkin bread recipe. The ingredients and baking instructions are relevant and applicable to the user's query.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3 1/3 c. sifted flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. pumpkin spice
3 c. sugar
1 c. coarsely chopped walnuts
4 eggs, beaten
1 1/2 c. canned pumpkin (use whole can)
1 c. salad oil
2/3 c. water
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients together in a large bowl; add walnuts. Add eggs, pumpkin, oil and water.
Blend lightly.
Pour into 2 greased bread tins and bake about 1 hour at 350°.
Freezes well.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for pumpkin bread, which includes pumpkin as an ingredient, aligning with the user's request for a spiced pumpkin bread recipe. However, it lacks specific mention of spices or spice mix, which is a crucial aspect of the user's question. The title implies it's a pumpkin bread, but the recipe details do not explicitly indicate it is 'spiced' as the user might expect.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
10 oz. Mozzarella, diced
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
1/4 tsp. salt
6 large boneless chicken breasts (approximately 2 lb.), pounded thin
2 eggs, lightly beaten
3 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. tomato sauce
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine cheese, eggs, crumbs, parsley, salt and pepper.
Place 1/4 cup of cheese mixture in center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with a toothpick.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making stuffed chicken breasts, which directly addresses the user's question. It includes all necessary ingredients and steps required for the dish, making it a relevant and useful response.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
10 oz. Swiss cheese, diced
2 eggs, lightly beaten
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
pinch of nutmeg
6 large boneless chicken breasts (about 2 lb.), pounded thin
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
2 c. Ragu chunky garden style spaghetti sauce with green peppers and mushrooms
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine cheese, eggs, bread crumbs, parsley, salt, pepper and nutmeg.
Place 1/4 cup cheese mixture in the center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with toothpicks.
In a large skillet, thoroughly brown chicken on all sides in hot oil; drain fat.
Pour spaghetti sauce over chicken.
Simmer, covered, 45 minutes or until chicken is done. Serves 6.
explanation: The answer provides a clear, step-by-step recipe for making stuffed chicken breasts, including all the necessary ingredients and cooking directions. It directly addresses the user's question about how to prepare stuffed chicken breasts, making it relevant and useful.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
6 skinless and boneless chicken breasts
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 chopped medium onion
1 chopped rib celery
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1 peeled carrot, chopped
3/4 c. seasoned bread crumbs
1/2 tsp. oregano
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
parsley, cayenne and paprika
Directions:
Pound breasts between two sheets of Saran Wrap to 1/8-inch thickness.
Saute onion, green pepper, carrot and garlic in butter until soft.
Add bread crumbs and 1/2 cup broth to mixture.
Salt and pepper to taste.
explanation: The answer provides a relevant and useful recipe for making stuffed chicken breasts. It lists necessary ingredients and gives clear cooking directions, including preparation of the filling and the chicken breasts themselves. The information directly addresses the user's question by explaining how to stuff and cook the chicken breasts.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breast
Ingredients:
8 oz. Swiss cheese, diced
2 eggs, slightly beaten
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
6 large boneless chicken breasts, pounded thin
2 Tbsp. oil (regular or olive)
2 c. spaghetti sauce
Directions:
In a medium bowl, combine cheese, eggs, bread crumbs, parsley, salt and pepper.
Place about 1 tablespoon of cheese mixture in the center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with toothpicks.
In a large skillet, thoroughly brown chicken on all sides in hot oil; drain off fat.
Pour spaghetti sauce over chicken.
Bake about 45 minutes at 350°.
explanation: The answer provides a step-by-step recipe for making stuffed chicken breasts, including ingredients and cooking directions. It directly addresses the user's question by explaining how to prepare and cook the dish.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1/4 c. chopped green onion
1/2 tsp. basil, crumbled
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 c. melted butter
2 tsp. chicken seasoned stock base
2 Tbsp. flour
3/4 c. Chablis or other white wine
1/2 c. half and half
2 whole chicken breasts, halved and boned
1 Tbsp. margarine (for frying)
Directions:
Mix toasted wheat germ, onion, basil and garlic powder into melted butter.
Combine stock base and flour; gradually add wine and half and half.
Stir until smooth.
Add 1 tablespoon of this sauce to wheat germ mixture and set remainder aside.
Place chicken breast on a board, cover with waxed paper and flatten with a mallet.
Place equal amount of wheat germ stuffing in center of each chicken breast.
Roll breasts around stuffing.
Fasten with picks.
Brown chicken and place in a baking dish.
Pour sauce over chicken.
Bake at 400° for 45 to 50 minutes.
explanation: The provided answer gives a detailed recipe for making stuffed chicken breasts, directly addressing the question. It lists the ingredients, provides a step-by-step process, and even includes cooking times and temperatures. The recipe aligns with the user's request for instructions on how to prepare stuffed chicken breasts.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Bake
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 garlic clove, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
4 oz. spaghetti (2 c., cooked)
1 can tuna in water, drained and flaked
1/2 c. cooked peas
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. wheat germ
Directions:
In small saucepan over medium-high heat, heat oil.
Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes.
Add tomato sauce and oregano; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer, stirring occasionally about 15 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a tuna pasta bake, which includes tuna as an ingredient. However, the recipe does not specifically mention anything about making the dish 'creamy.' The inclusion of creamy ingredients like low-fat cottage cheese and wheat germ suggests that the recipe may be creamy, but the description lacks emphasis on the creaminess aspect. Therefore, it partially addresses the user's question about a creamy tuna pasta bake.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
4 slices sweet onion (thin)
4 slices red onion (thin)
1/2 lb. tuna, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 small tomatoes, sliced
1/4 c. black olives, sliced
2 Tbsp. basil (fresh), minced
2 tsp. garlic, minced
salt and pepper to taste
1/4 lb. linguine
2 Tbsp. capers, drained
Italian parsley sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Heat oil in heavy medium skillet over medium-low heat.
Add onions and cook until translucent, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Add tuna, tomatoes, olives, basil, garlic, salt and pepper; cook until fish is opaque, stirring often, about 9 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a tuna pasta dish, which includes many of the ingredients and steps relevant to a creamy tuna pasta bake. However, it lacks specific instructions on how to make the dish creamy, such as adding cream or cheese, which are essential components of a pasta bake. Thus, while it partially addresses the question by providing a tuna pasta recipe, it omits critical information about achieving the creamy texture.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta-Tuna Bake
Ingredients:
8 oz. (2 c.) macaroni shells, cooked and drained
2 cans (6 1/2 oz.) tuna, drained and chunked
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. milk
3 c. loosely packed parsley (1 bunch), thick stems removed
2/3 c. coarsely chopped green onions
Directions:
In greased 2-quart baking dish toss shells, tuna and celery. In blender mix mayonnaise, milk, parsley and green onions until smooth.
Pour over tuna mixture; toss to coat.
Bake in preheated 400° oven 15 minutes or until bubbly.
explanation: The provided recipe does involve tuna and pasta, which aligns with the question about a creamy tuna pasta bake. However, the recipe does not specify that it is 'creamy' or that it is a 'bake'. While it meets some criteria of a tuna pasta dish, it lacks complete information to fully answer the user's question about a creamy tuna pasta bake.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Bake(Microwave)
Ingredients:
6 strips cooked lasagna
1 small onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. flour
2 c. frozen vegetables
1 c. milk
1 1/2 c. shredded cheese
1 c. cottage cheese
1 egg
dash of black pepper
12 1/2 oz. can drained tuna
Directions:
Place lasagna in a 12 x 7-inch glass baking dish. Cover with water and set aside.
In 1-quart glass dish, combine onion, oil and flour. Cook on High power 1 minute. Stir to dissolve flour. Stir in vegetables and milk.
Cook on High for 4 minutes, stirring once. Combine cheese, cottage cheese, egg and pepper.
Drain lasagna.
In the same dish, layer half each lasagna, vegetables, cheese and tuna.
Repeat layers and top with remaining cheese. Cover and cook on High power 15 minutes or until hot.
Let stand 10 minutes or so.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe, but it seems to be for a microwave tuna pasta bake, not a creamy tuna pasta bake that might be traditionally baked in an oven and typically involves a creamy sauce. The ingredients and directions do not specifically mention creating a creamy sauce, which is a key aspect of the user's question.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Creamy Tuna Twist
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. vinegar
dash of pepper
4 oz. pasta twists, cooked and drained
1 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. chopped red onion
1/4 c. snipped dill or 1 Tbsp. dried dill weed
1 can tuna
Directions:
In large bowl, stir together first 3 ingredients until smooth. Add remaining ingredients; toss to coat well.
Cover.
Chill.
explanation: The provided answer gives a recipe title 'Creamy Tuna Twist' and lists ingredients and basic directions, which are relevant to making a creamy tuna dish. However, it does not specifically mention a 'pasta bake', which is a key component of the user's question. The inclusion of pasta twists suggests that pasta is used, but the absence of details about baking the dish, such as oven temperature or cooking time, makes the answer only partially relevant to the user's query.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
3 egg yolks
1 2/3 c. buttermilk
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. butter
3 egg whites, stiffly beaten
Directions:
Beat egg yolks with rotary beater. Add remaining ingredients except egg whites and beat until smooth. Gently fold in egg whites.
Pour onto hot griddle.
explanation: The provided answer gives a partial recipe for making pancakes, which includes ingredients and steps like beating egg yolks and folding in egg whites. However, it does not specify that the pancakes are buttermilk-based, nor does it provide details on achieving the 'fluffy' texture that was specifically asked for in the question. To be fully relevant, the answer should emphasize the use of buttermilk and include tips for making the pancakes fluffy.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: "Fluffy" Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. oil
1 egg
1 c. flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix first 3 ingredients together.
Mix dry ingredients together.
Mix together liquid and dry ingredients.
Let mixture stand for 5 to 10 minutes, then proceed as usual to griddle pancakes.
explanation: The answer provides a clear and relevant recipe for making fluffy buttermilk pancakes, including all necessary ingredients and step-by-step directions which align with the user's question.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cooking oil or melted butter
2 c. flour
Directions:
Take turns holding the mixer until eggs are fluffy.
Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until smooth, but do not overmix. Grease hot griddle with shortening.
Pour batter to make 4 inch pancakes.
Cook until puffed, turn and cook other side until golden brown.
We like to cut them into shapes and spread butter and jelly.
explanation: The answer provides a comprehensive recipe for making fluffy buttermilk pancakes, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions that directly address the user's question. It mentions key aspects such as using buttermilk, ensuring the batter is not overmixed, and cooking instructions that lead to fluffy pancakes. Additionally, it offers a suggestion for serving the pancakes, which is a common practice.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
3 to 4 egg whites
3 to 4 egg yolks
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 2/3 c. buttermilk
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
pinch of salt
1 1/2 c. flour
3 Tbsp. grease
Directions:
Beat the egg whites until fluffy. Combine the yolks.
Add and beat together the sugar, buttermilk, soda, baking powder, salt, flour and grease.
Fold in egg whites.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe including ingredients and steps that are related to making pancakes, but it omits crucial information about achieving fluffiness. The process does not explicitly mention any techniques or tips for making pancakes fluffy, which is a key aspect of the user's question.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 egg, beaten
1 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. melted margarine
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, soda, baking powder and salt.
Combine egg, buttermilk and butter; slowly stir into dry ingredients. Batter will be very thick.
For each pancake, spoon about 1/4 cup batter onto a hot, lightly greased griddle.
Turn pancakes when tops are covered with bubbles and edges are brown.
explanation: The answer provides a step-by-step recipe for making pancakes, which includes the use of buttermilk as specified in the question. Although the title does not explicitly mention 'fluffy' pancakes, the process described (mixing dry and wet ingredients and ensuring the batter is thick) is commonly associated with achieving a fluffy texture in pancakes. Therefore, it is relevant to the user's question.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Panang Curry
Ingredients:
1 (14 oz.) can Taste of Thai coconut milk
1 Tbsp. Taste of Thai Panang Curry Base
1 lb. boneless chicken, cut in strips
2 Tbsp. Taste of Thai seasoning sauce
2 tsp. lemon juice
1 medium tomato, diced
1 yellow bell pepper, diced
3 scallions, diced
2 c. mushrooms, sliced
2 tsp. Taste of Thai garlic chili pepper sauce (use this cautiously; you might prefer a little less)
Directions:
In a large saucepan, combine coconut milk and curry base and cook until blended over medium heat.
Add chicken, seasoning sauce and lemon juice and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients, except mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce.
Cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce to taste.
Cover and simmer for 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.
explanation: The provided answer outlines a recipe for Chicken Panang Curry, which involves using coconut milk as a base for the sauce. While the main ingredient, coconut milk, is relevant to the concept of a creamy coconut curry sauce, the recipe specified does not seem to be a general coconut curry sauce but rather a specific dish that includes chicken. Additionally, the answer omits mention of any cream or other potential ingredients that could be used to enhance the creaminess of the sauce directly. Therefore, it is partly relevant because it touches on the use of coconut milk but lacks a comprehensive guide for creating a creamy coconut curry sauce in general.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Curried-Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen shrimp in shells
1 c. sifted all purpose flour
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 slightly beaten egg
2 Tbsp. salad oil
2/3 c. grated coconut
1-1/2 tsp. curry powder
Directions:
Cook 1 pound shelled shrimp; drain.
In saucepan melt 1/4 cup butter or margarine.
Stir in 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour.
Add 1 1/2 cups milk all at once; cook and stir till thickened and bubbly.
Add shrimp, 1/4 cup dry sherry, 1/2 teaspoon salt, dash pepper, and dash paprika.
Pour into 5 coquilles (individual baking shells).
Sprinkle each serving with 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese.
Broil 3 to 4 inches from heat till cheese browns.
Makes 5 servings.
explanation: The provided answer gives instructions for making Curried-Coconut Shrimp, which is a dish that includes coconut but does not specifically address creating a creamy coconut curry sauce. The steps and ingredients listed are focused on preparing a shrimp dish rather than a sauce, hence it does not fully answer the question about making a creamy coconut curry sauce.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Curry With Coconut Milk
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 large onion, finely chopped
1 cardamom pod, crushed
1-inch piece cinnamon stick
4 cloves
salt to taste
4 whole black peppercorns
1/2 tsp. turmeric
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped ginger
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
4 c. large peeled shrimp
2 c. coconut milk*
Directions:
Melt butter in a saucepan.
Add onion and brown.
Add all the spices and saute for 2 minutes.
Add shrimp and saute 1/2 minute. Add coconut milk (strained) and 1/4 cup shredded coconut that is leftover after straining.
Cover and cook on medium heat until the gravy thickens.
Serve over plain rice or polao.
Serves 4 to 6.
explanation: The provided answer offers a recipe for a Shrimp Curry with Coconut Milk, which includes key components such as coconut milk—a fundamental ingredient for a creamy coconut curry sauce. However, it is specific to shrimp and does not provide a general method or recipe for making a creamy coconut curry sauce that could be used with various main ingredients. Thus, while it partially addresses the concept of a creamy coconut curry sauce, it does not fully satisfy the question's requirement for a versatile recipe.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Mix Vegetable Curry
Ingredients:
3 med. onions, chopped
3 med. tomatoes, chopped
clove, cumin, cinnamon, peppercorn
finely shredded coconut
cilantro, chopped
oil
frozen mix vegetable 1/2 bag
poppy seeds
garlic paste
salt
small carton of whipping cream
red chili powder
Directions:
Heat a sauce pan on high heat.
Put some oil in it.
Add onions and cook on med heat until lightly brown and until the oil separates.
Add tomatoes and mix vegetable and cook until tender and oil comes on top.
explanation: The answer provides a general method for making a curry sauce, mentioning the use of coconut, which is relevant to a creamy coconut curry sauce. However, it does not specify that the sauce should be creamy or include critical details such as a roux or additional creaminess-enhancing ingredients like coconut milk. The use of 'whipping cream' could contribute to creaminess, but it is not clear if it is meant to be combined with coconut or other ingredients specifically for a coconut curry sauce.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry Surprises
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped, cooked chicken
2 Tbsp. chopped apple
2 Tbsp. chopped green onion
1 c. finely chopped peanuts
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. curry powder
dash of hot sauce
1 (7 oz.) bag shredded coconut
Directions:
Combine the chicken with the chopped apple, green onion, peanuts, mayonnaise, curry powder and hot sauce in large bowl, blending well.
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 4 hours or until chilled.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a chicken curry surprise, which includes coconut as an ingredient. However, it does not specifically address the creation of a 'creamy coconut curry sauce' as the user's question requests. The inclusion of coconut is relevant, but the absence of detailed instructions for creating a coconut-based sauce makes the answer only partly relevant.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Crispy Fish Batter
Ingredients:
3/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. soda
Directions:
Mix together and store in an airtight container.
When ready to make batter into dip, pour amount desired into bowl and add water to desired consistency.
Dip food and fry in hot oil.
Also good for onion rings, chicken, mushrooms, etc.
explanation: The provided answer gives a recipe for a crispy fish batter, which is relevant to making crispy fish for tacos. However, it does not directly address the process of assembling the tacos or the inclusion of other typical taco ingredients such as tortillas, salsa, etc. Therefore, it partially relates to the user's question about how to make crispy fish tacos.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground meat
1 large onion
1/2 tsp. cumin seed or powder
garlic powder to taste
1 hot jalapeno pepper
4 to 5 chopped fresh tomatoes or Del Monte Mexican style canned tomatoes
1 box taco shells
chopped lettuce and tomatoes (for topping)
Directions:
Heat shells in oven (325°) until crisp.
Simmer all ingredients for 45 minutes, thickening with 1 tablespoon flour if needed.
Spoon filling into taco shells.
Top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes and shredded cheese.
